translation.en: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.
translation.ig: Na Monde, ndi oka mmuta sayensi sitere na Mahadum Stanford Ulo-akwukwo nke Ogwu kwuputara nchoputa nke ngwa-oru nyochaputa ohuu nwere it hoputa mkpuru-ahu site udi: otu mpekere ngwa nka nke enwere ike iruputa site na iji inkjeti igwe-prita din mma nke enwere-ike imeputa na otu senti mba US n’otu.

translation.en: Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
translation.ig: Ndị isi nchọpụta sị na nke a nwere ike iweta maka nnyochapụta n'oge nke ọrịa kansa, ụkwara nta, obiri n'aja ọcha, na ịba nye ndị nọ n'ọrịa n'obodo ndị n'enweghị ego, ebe nnapụta n'aka ọrịa dịka kansa nke ara nwere ike ịbụ ọkara otu ọdị n'obodo ndị kara nwee ego.

translation.en: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.
translation.ig: Ụgbọ JAS 39C Gripen kpọkasịrị n'okporo ụzọ ụgbọelu ebe ihe dị ka 9:30 nke ụtụtụ oge obodo (0230 UTC) ma gbawaa, nke mere ka a kagbuo njem ofufe niile n'odụ ụgbọelu a.

translation.en: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.
translation.ig: Achọpụtara onye onyaa ụgbọ elu a dịka Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.

translation.en: Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.
translation.ig: Ndị mgbasa ozi ebeụlọ na-akọ maka ụgbọ ala mgbanyụ ọkụ ọdụ ụgbọ elu tụgharịrị n'okpuru ya mgbe ọ na-aza.

translation.en: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla.
translation.ig: Vidal gbara afọ iri abụọ na asatọ esonyela Barça n'oge egwuregwu bọọlụ atọ gara aga, site na Sevilla.

translation.en: Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.
translation.ig: Kemgbe ọ kwagara na isi obodo Catalan, Vidal egwurula klọb egwuregwu 49.

translation.en: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence.
translation.ig: Ngagharị iwe ahụ malitere ihe dị ka oge obodo 11:00 (UTC+1) na Whitehall n’ofe ụzọ mbata nke okporo ámá Downing ahụ ndị uwe ojii na-echekwa, ụlọ keọkwa nke Onye isi ala ahụ.

translation.en: Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall.
translation.ig: Mgbe okuchara nnoo elekere 11:00, ndi ngahari-iwe anochie owa-ugbo na okporo gawara-mpaghar-ugwu na Whitehall.

translation.en: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up.
translation.ig: N'elekere 11:20, ndị uwe ojii gwara ndị ngagharị iwe ahụ ka ha laghachi azụ n'elu ụzọ ebe ndị ji ụkwụ na-aga, na-akọwa na ọ dịla mkpa ha ịtụle ikike ha nwere ime ngagharị iwe dịka ụzọ na-akpọchi.

translation.en: Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
translation.ig: Ihe dị ka mgbe oge jiri nkeji iri abụọ na itolu gafee elekere iri na otu, ngahari mkpesa ahụ gbagoro Whitehall, gafee ebe ọgbakọ Trafalgar, n'ụzọ Strand, ma a gafee Aldwych ma gbagoo Kingswee n'ebe Hoborn, ebe Otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Kọnzavetiv nọ na-enwe ọgbakọ udu mmiri ha n'ime ụlọ nkwari akụ Grand Konnọt Rums.

translation.en: Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2.
translation.ig: Ihe ogo mmeri n'asọmụmpi nke ndị Nadal ji megide nke ndị Kanada bụ 7-2.

translation.en: He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open.
translation.ig: Ọ dara n’oge na-adịghị anya megide Raonic na Mmepe Brisbane ahụ.

translation.en: Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve.
translation.ig: Nadal nwere 88% n’egwuregwu ahụ iji merie na 76 n’ọrụ izizi.

translation.en: After the match, King of Clay said, "I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."
translation.ig: Ka ndọrọ ndọrọ egwuregwu gasịrị, Eze Kle were sị, "Enwerem nnọọ obi añurị ịbụ onye bịaghachiri na agba nke ikpeazụ nke mmemme ndị kacha mkpa. A nọ m ebe a ịgbalị imeri ihe a."

translation.en: "Panama Papers" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016.
translation.ig: Panama Papers bụ aha gburugburu maka ihe ruru nde akwụkwọ iri nke ụlọ ọrụ iwu nke Panama bụ Mossack Fonseca, gbakwunyere ndị nta akụkọ n'oge sprịng 2016.

translation.en: The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations.
translation.ig: Akwukwo ahu gosiri na ulo aku iri na ano nyere ndi ogaranya n’azu ha ahia aka were zoo ijeri US dollars ka ha were gbalaga ikwu tax na ihe ndi ozo.

translation.en: British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this.
translation.ig: Di Gadịan, ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ ozi Briten, tụrụ aro na Deutsche Bank bụ ndị na-ahụ maka ihe dị ka otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ nke ụlọ ọrụ 1200 anọghị n'ọrụ, ndị e ji wee mee ihe a.

translation.en: There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
translation.ig: Enwere ngagharị mkpesa gburugburu ụwa, ọtụtụ mkpegbu ndị omekome, na ndị isi ọchịchị obodo Iceland na Pakistan gbakwara arụkwaghịm

translation.en: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident "green card".
translation.ig: A mụrụ ya na Họng Kọng, Ma gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Niu Yọk, makwa Mahadum Ikpe nke Havad n'otu oge o nwekwara "akwukwo obibi" na-adigide adigide nke obodo Amerịka.

translation.en: Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis.
translation.ig: Hsieh kwuru okwu n’oge ntuliaka na Ma nwere ike ịgbapụ n'obodo n'oge ọgba aghara.

translation.en: Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance.
translation.ig: Hsieh kwukwara na Ma mara mma foto bụ naanị ịchọ mma ka ọ maara, na onweghi ihe ọ chị.

translation.en: Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland.
translation.ig: Agbanyeghị ebubo ndị a, Ma meriri ọfụma n'otu na-akwado ịmụba mmekọrịta ha na Chaịna ukwu.

translation.en: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals.
translation.ig: Onye egwuregwu nke taa a na-akwanyere ugwu Taa bụ Alex Ovechkin nke Washington Capitals.

translation.en: He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers.
translation.ig: O nwere goolu abụọ na enyemaka abụọ na mmeri 5-3 nke Washington meriri Atlanta Thrashers.

translation.en: Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom;
translation.ig: Enyemaka mgbanyere bọọlụ mbụ Ovechkin nyere n'egwuregwu bọọlụ nke abalị ahụ bụ ya butere ọkpụ goolu mmeri sitere n'aka Nicklas Backstrom.

translation.en: his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
translation.ig: Gol ya nke abụọ n'abalị ahụ bụ nke 60 ya n'afọ egwuregwu a, nke mere ya onye egwuregwu nke mbụ yọgoro gol 60 maọbụ karịa n'otu afọ egwuregwu kemgbe 1995-96, mgbe Jaromir Jagr na Mario Lemieux rutere ogo ahụ.

translation.en: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion.
translation.ig: E nyere Batten ọkwa onye nke 190 na ndepụta mmadụ 400 ndị Amerika kachasị baa ọgaranya n'afọ 2008 dịka na akụnaụba ya ruru ihe dịka ijeri $2.3.

translation.en: He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.
translation.ig: Ọ gụchara akwụkwọ na Mpaghara nke Nka na Sayensị nke Mahadum nke Vejinia n'afo 1950 ma bụrụkwa onye na enye onyinye ama ama n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ.

translation.en: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot.
translation.ig: Mkpọrọ Abu Ghraib nke Irakị bụ nke amụnyere ọkụ n’oge otu ogbaaghara.

translation.en: The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.
translation.ig: Ụlọ nga ahụ ghọọrọ ihe ama mgbe achọpụtara mmegide ndị atụrụ nga n'ebe ahu ka ndị agha US weere ọnọdụ.

translation.en: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car.
translation.ig: Piquet Jr. kpọkashịrị n’ime 2008 Singapore Grand Prix ozugbo o mechara nkwụsị obere oge maka Fernando Alonso, na-ewepụta ụgbọala nchekwa ahụ.

translation.en: As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory.
translation.ig: Ka ụgbọ ala ndị ahụ bu Alonso ụzọ gara ịgbata mmanụ ụgbọala n'okpuru ụgbọ nchekwa, o duuru ndị n'eso ya wee were ọnọdụ mmeri.

translation.en: Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
translation.ig: Achụpụrụ Piquet Jr. mgbe Asọmpi Nnukwu Ịgba ọsọ nke ụgbọ n'afọ 2009 nke Họngarị gasịrị.

translation.en: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target.
translation.ig: Na kpọmkwem n'elekere asatọ nke ụtụtụ owu dara n'ofe obodo ahụ, na-aka akara kpọmkwem ogenta ahụ ụgbọelu nke mbụ gbara na nzube ya.

translation.en: Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight.
translation.ig: E dochiri ụzọ abụọ dị ọkụ iji rụtụrụ mbara igwe n'otu abalị.

translation.en: Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.
translation.ig: Owuwu ụlọ ruru igwe ise na-aga n'ihu n'ebe ọrụ, a na arụkwa ụlọ njem na ogige ncheta n'etiti.

translation.en: The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood.
translation.ig: Ihe ngosi PBS nwere ihe kariri iri abuo Emmy nyere ya, oso oso ya di mkpirisi karia Sesame Street na Mister Rogers 'Neighborhood.

translation.en: Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories.
translation.ig: Nkebi nke ọbụla n'ihe nkiri ahụ ga-etinye uche n’otu isiokwu n’ime otu akwụkwọ akọwapụtara ma mgbe ahụ nyogharịa isiokwu ahụ site n’ọtụtụ akụkọ.

translation.en: Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library.
translation.ig: Ihe ngosi ọbụla gakwa enye ụmụ nkwanye maka akwụkwọ ndị nke ụmụaka kwesịrị ịchọ maka mgbe ha gara n’ọbaakwụkwọ ha.

translation.en: John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said "Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."
translation.ig: John Grant nke WNED Buffalo(ebe Reading Rainbow) kwuru si na "Reading Rainbow ekuzigoro umuaka ihe kpatara ha ga eji guo akwukwo, ...ihunanya nke igu akwukwo -[ihe ngosi] na-akwado umuaka ka ha tuturu akwukwo guo."

translation.en: It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series.
translation.ig: Ụfọdụ, tinyere Jọn Grant, kwenyere na mbelata mbinye ego na mgbanwe na nka ihe ọmụma gbasara ndozi ihe ngosi nkuzi ihe so weta maka njedebe ihe ngosi ahụ.

translation.en: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say.
translation.ig: Ebili mmiri ahụ, nke nọ ihe dịka maịlụ 645 (1040 km) n'ọdịda anyanwụ isuo nke Kep Ved, nwere ike ịdajụ tupu orute ebe obibi, ndị nhụta ihu igwe kwuru.

translation.en: Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest.
translation.ig: Ugbu a, Fred nwere ikuku nke kilomita 105 kwa awa (165 km/h) ma na-aga n'akụkụ nọtwest.

translation.en: Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.
translation.ig: Fred bu oke ikuku ebe okpomọkụ kachasi sie ike edekogwere n’ebe ndida ya n’owuwa nke osmiri Atllantic ka mgbe obibia foto satilaiti, o bukwazi ajo ifufe nke ato enwegoro n’odida nke 35°W.

translation.en: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland.
translation.ig: Na Septemba 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness banyere na nkwekọrịta ịnwere Briwiri St Jems Get na Dublin, Ireland, ruo afọ puku iteghete.

translation.en: 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.
translation.ig: Ka afọ 250 gasịrị, Gines etoruola ogugo azụmahịa zuru ụwa nke na enweta ihe karịrị euro iri nde (US$14.7 billion) ọnwa ọbụla

translation.en: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally.
translation.ig: Jọni Reid, onye ọkwọ ụgbọala ibe m maka otu A1GP nke Niu Ziland, mere ihe a na-emebeghi mbụ taa site na-inyakari ọsịsọ gafee akwa mmiri Ọkland Habọ nke dị afọ iri anọ na asatọ, na-emebighị iwu.

translation.en: Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge.
translation.ig: Mazi Reid jisiri ike nyaa ụgbọala a na-akpọ nwa mma dị oji bụ A1GP nke Niu Ziland, n'ogugo ọsọ nke 160km/h ugboro asaa gafee akwa mmiri ahụ.

translation.en: The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.
translation.ig: Ndị uwe ojii New Zealand police nwere nsogbu iji reda èkwòmọsọ ha ịhụ ọsọ ole Maazị Reid na-agba n’ihi etu ala Black Beauty dị, ma naanị oge ndị uwe ojii gbalịrị ma nweta Maazị Reid bụ mgbe jiri nwayọọ ruo km/a160.

translation.en: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged.
translation.ig: N'ọnwa ato gara-aga, ndi nga karịrị iri asatọ ka a hapụrụ site n'ụlọ mgba akwụkwọ nke etiti n'enweghị akwụkwọ agbara ha

translation.en: In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner.
translation.ig: Na onwa eprel afo a,oka-iwu Glynn nyere iwu mmachi nke ga adi nwa oge-nta megide ogige ahu iji kwudosie-ike nye ntohapu nke ndi eji-eji karia awa 24 ejidere ha bu ndi n’enwetaghi onunu ziri-ezi site n’aka onye-isi ulo-ikpe.

translation.en: The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked.
translation.ig: Kọmishọna na ewepụta ụgwọ mgbapụta, ọbụrụ na ekwenye na ya, ma hazie ụgwọ akwụkwọ onye jidere onye omekome gbara ya. Akwụkwọ ndị a ka a ga edenye kọmputa nke steeti ebe aga-esi wee sowe okwu ahụ.

translation.en: The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.
translation.ig: Oge ikpe izizi na egosikwa oge onye a na enyo enyo nwere ikike isi ka ekpee ya bụ ikpe ọsịsọ.

translation.en: Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia.
translation.ig: Pita Kostello, Onye Ndokwa akụ Ọstrelia na onye a na-ele anya ga-anọchi Praịm Minista Jọn Howard dịka onye isi otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Libral, ewerela nkwado ya nye otu ụlọ ọrụ na-eme ihe gbasara ike nuklia n'Ọstrelia.

translation.en: Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use.
translation.ig: Mazị Kostello sị na mgbe mmepụta ike nuklia ghọorọ ihe nchekwa akụ, obodo Ọstrelia ga agbagharị ịhụ na etinyere ya n'ọrụ.

translation.en: "If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy" Mr Costello said.
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ na ọ ghọrọ azụmahịa, anyị kwesịrị inwe ya. Nke ahụ bụ, enweghị nkwekọrịta dị adị maka ike nuklia Mr Costello kwuru.

translation.en: According to Ansa, "police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession.
translation.ig: Dika Ansa si kwuo, "ndi uwe-ojii nwere mmetu maka nkuta di-elu ole na ole ha turu-ujo nwere-ike ikpasu ezigbo agha nke nsota.

translation.en: Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network.
translation.ig: Ndị uwe ojii kwuru na Lo Pikolo bụ onye ka dị ike maka na ọ rụọrọla Provenzano ọrụ na Palemo dị ka onye nnọchiteanya, nakwa ahụmahụ ya karịrịnụ mere ka ndị ọga kara aka sọpụrụ ya maka ha kwadoro iwu Provenzano tinyere maka izopu onwe, jiri nwayọọ na-amụba ikikere.

translation.en: These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
translation.ig: Povenzano kwụsịrị ndị isi a mgbe ọ kwụsịrị agha Riina nke megidere steeti nke weere ndụ ndị agha ntụgharị Mafia bụ Giovanni Falkon na Paolo Borsellino n'afọ 1992."

translation.en: Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket.
translation.ig: Onyeisi ụlọọrụ Apple bụ Steve Jobs kpuhere ekwentị ahụ site n'iwepụta ya bụ ekwentị iPhone n'akpa uwe ukwu jiini ya mgbe ọ na-agbago n'elu nkwago.

translation.en: During his 2 hour speech he stated that "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today".
translation.ig: N’okwu ya nke ruru awa 2, o kwuru “Taa Apple ga-agbanwe ekwentị dị ka ụwa si mara ya, Anyị ga-eme oke ihe taa”.

translation.en: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country.
translation.ig: Brazil bụ mba Roman Katọlik kachasị ukwuu n'ụwa, na Chọọchị Roman Katọlik emegidewo iwu ịgba alụkwaghịm nwoke na nwanyị na mba ahụ ..

translation.en: The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul.
translation.ig: Nzuko Omeiwu Nke Mba Brazịl rụrịtara ụka nkwado iwu ruo afọ iri, ma ụdị alụmdi na nwunye obodo ahụ bụ ugbu a naanị a kwadoro n'iwu n'ime Rio Grande do Sul.

translation.en: The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson.
translation.ig: Iwu mbụ ahụ bụ onye bụbu onyeisi obodo nke São Paulo, Marta Suplicy wepụtara ya. Iwu ahụ achọrọ ime, mgbe e mezichara ya, nọzi ugbu a n’aka Roberto Jefferson.

translation.en: Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.
translation.ig: Ndi ngaghari iwe nwere olile-anye inweta mkpesa ntibanye aka n’akwukwo nde 1.2 iji gosi nzuko ome-iwu ala-anyi n’onwa Novemba.

translation.en: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam.
translation.ig: Ka o doro anya na ọtụtụ ezinụlo na-achọ enyemaka iwu iluso nchụpụ n'ụlọ ndị ahụ ọgụ, e nwere otu ọgbako na Maachị 20 n'Ebe Iwu Obodo Ọnụ Mmiri Ọwụwa Anyanwu ahụ maka ndị e megburu n'ojoro ebe obibi ahụ.

translation.en: When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town.
translation.ig: Mgbe ndị gbazitere ụlọ bidoro na-akọwara ha ihe mere, ọtụtụ ezinụlọ ndị o metụtara bịara chọpụta na Karolin Wịlsịn onye ụlọ ọrụ OHA eburula ego ha kwụnyegoro si n'obodo larie.

translation.en: Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.
translation.ig: Ndị bi na Lọkwud Gadịns kwenyere na ọnwere ike inwe ihe dị ka ezinụlọ iri anọ maọbụ karịa ndị a ga achụpụ n'ebe obibi, ebe ha matara na ndị uwe ojii OHA so na eleba anya n'ihe gbasara ihe onwunwe nke ụlọ obibi ọha nke di na Okland ndị nwere ike ịnọ n'ọnọdụ aghụghọ gbasara ebe obibi.

translation.en: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans.
translation.ig: Ndị otu ahụ kagburu ihe ngosipụ ahụ na Maui's War Memorial Stadium, nke mmadụ 9,000 ga-aga, ma rịọ mgbaghara ndị nkwado.

translation.en: The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.
translation.ig: Ụlọ ọrụ nlekọta òtù nkwa egwu ahụ, bụ HK Management Inc., enyeghị nkọwa nke izizi mgbe ha kagburu na Septemba 20, mana ha boro ya ihe mkpata lọjistik mgbe chi foro.

translation.en: The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption.
translation.ig: Ndị ọka ikpe Grik amaara aha ha, Sakis Kechagioglou na Jiọj Nikolakopoulos ka atụrụ mkpọrọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ nke Atens nke dị na Korydallus, n'ihi na achọpụtara na ikpe mara ha n'okwụ gbasara iri ego oha na mpu.

translation.en: As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years.
translation.ig: N'ihi nke a, nnukwu nsogbu bilitere n'etiti ọgbakọ ndị oka iwu nke Gris site na-igba n'anwụ omume n'ezighi ezi nke ndị ọka ikpe na ndị oka iwu na ndị solositọ na ndị atoni mere n'afọ ndị gara aga.

translation.en: A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show "Zoungla" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption.
translation.ig: Izuụka ole ma ole gara aga, ka ebipụtachara ozi onye odeakụko bụ Makis Triantafylopoulos n'ihe onyonyo ya a maara nke ọma bụ "Zoungla" n'ọwa ihe ngosi igwe onyonyo bụ Alfa, onye otu nzukọ omeiwu nakwa ọkaiwu, Petros Mantouvalos ka a chụpụrụ dịka na ndị ụlọọrụ ya sonyere n'ihe mmegide iwu mpụ na ngarị.

translation.en: Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour.
translation.ig: Nke ka nke, atuola oka-iwu di elu Evangelos Kalousis nga ebe ahutara na aka ya na mpu tinyere omume na aso-oyi.

translation.en: Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases.
translation.ig: Robets jụrụ ikwu okwu gbasara ngbe okwetara na ndụ n'ebido, ajụjụ dị oke mkpa ma a na eleba anya n'ihe gbasara ụkpụrụ omume ntepụ ime, ọ sị na ọ bụ ihe megidere ụkpụrụ omume ikwu okwu kpọmkwem gbasara okwu akpụ n'ọnụ.

translation.en: He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the "settled law of the land", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings.
translation.ig: O mechekwara kwugharịa ihe o kwuru mbụ, na ikpe Roe v. Wade bụ "iwu ala ekpebigoro", na-akọwa etu o si dị mkpa ka mkpebi Ụlọ ikpe kachasị elu bụrụ agbanwe agbanwe.

translation.en: He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon.
translation.ig: O kwenyere na o kweere na ikikere nzuzo e kwuru nke mkpebi Roe dabere na ya.

translation.en: Maroochydore had finished on top of the ladder, six points clear of Noosa in second.
translation.ig: Maroochydore mechara bụrụ onye nke mbụ n'ogo ahụ, o ji akara isii gafee Noosa bịara n'onye nke abụọ.

translation.en: The two sides would meet in the major semi final where Noosa ran out winners by 11 points.
translation.ig: Ngalaba abụọ ahụ ga-ezute na mmeme ukwu n'ebute mmeme ngwụcha ụzọ ebe Noosa ji ọkpụ iri na otu emerie.

translation.en: Maroochydore then defeated Caboolture in the Preliminary Final.
translation.ig: Maroochidore ewere merie Caboolture na mmeme ngwụcha nke izizi.

translation.en: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor .
translation.ig: Hesperonychus elizabethae bụ ụdị ụmụ nke ezinụlọ Dromaeosauridae ma ọ bụ nwa nwanne nna nke Velociraptor .

translation.en: This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor.
translation.ig: Nnụnụ a nku juru ahụ na-eri anụ, bụ nke ekweere na dika ajọ anụ Velosiraptọ na o jere ije n'ọnọdụ kwụ ọtọ n'ụkwụ abụọ nwere mbọ aka.

translation.en: Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means "western claw."
translation.ig: Mkpisiri aka ya nke abuo buru ibu karia, nke tuputara aha ahu bu Hesperonychus nke putara “nkpisiri odida-anyanwu”.

translation.en: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts.
translation.ig: Tinyere mmiri oyi siri ike, ọnọdụ ihu igwe dị egwu na egbochi mgbalị nzọpụta.

translation.en: Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week.
translation.ig: Pittman tụnyere n’ọnọdụ ndị ahụ agaghị adịwa mma ruo mgbe ụfọdụ n’izu na-abịanụ.

translation.en: The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.
translation.ig: Onu-ogugu na idi-ike nke mmiri ahu jukporo oyi, dika Pittman si kwuo, bu nke kacha njo karia otu ona-adi nye nyi nkeko kemgbe afo 15 gara-aga.

translation.en: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21.
translation.ig: Akụkọ gbasara n'ime obodo Red Lek taa dịka a na eme olili ozu Jeff Weise na mmadụ atọ ọzọ n'ime mmadụ itolu ndị ihe mmerede metụtara na ejidere nwa akwụkwọ ọzọ maka okwu gbasara mgbagbu mere n'ụlọ akwụkwọ n'ụbọchị nke iri abụọ na otu nke ọnwa Maachị.

translation.en: Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest.
translation.ig: Ndị nọ n’ọchịchị kwuru obere n’ọrụ gabiga nkwenye njide taa.

translation.en: However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain.
translation.ig: Mana, otu onye maara maka nnyocha a gwara Miniapolis Sta-Tribun na ọ bụ Luwi Jurdan, nwa nwoke Flọịd Jurdan, onye isi Red Lek Traịbal, nke dị afọ 16.

translation.en: It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.
translation.ig: Amatabeghi ugbu a ebubo a ga-ebo maọbụ ihe mere ndị isi ji wee nyowe nwata nwoke a, mana ebidola usoro ikpe ụmụazị n'ụlọ ikpe gọọmenti.

translation.en: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election.
translation.ig: Lodin sịkwara na ndị isi kpebiri na a ga akagbu emume ntuli aka nke abuo iji nwee onye mmeri ka enwee ike ịnapụta ndị mba Afganistan n'aka oke mmefu ego makwa n'aka ihe na-emegide nchekwa na-esote ntuli aka.

translation.en: Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary.
translation.ig: Ndị nnọchiteanya mbà kwuru na ha ahụghị ezigbi ihe mgbagwujuanya n’usoro iwu ndị Afghan iji kpebie n’usoro ntụziaka ahụ ezighị ezi.

translation.en: This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.
translation.ig: Nke a na-aga na mmegide ihe akọbụrụ na mbụ, nke bụ na ịkagbu mgbapụ ahụ gara ịda iwu.

translation.en: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops.
translation.ig: Ụgbọelu ahụ na-agabu Irkutsk na ọ bụ ndị agha nke ụlọ na-anya ya.

translation.en: An inquiry was established to investigate.
translation.ig: E tinyere nnyocha iji mee nchọpụta.

translation.en: The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month.
translation.ig: Il-76 bụ ngalaba gbapụtara ihe nke ndị agha Rọshịa na Sọviyetị kamgbe afọ 1970 ga, ma hụkwalarị ihe mberede siri oke ike na mba Rọshịa n'ọnwa gara aga.

translation.en: On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.
translation.ig: N'ụbọchị nke asaa n'ọnwa Oktoba otu njin pụrụ dịka ụgbọelu na-efeli, n'enweghị mmerụ ahụ ọbụla. Mba Rọshia kagburu ụgbọelu Il-76s ifegharị ka ihe mberede ahụ mechara.

translation.en: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
translation.ig: Emechiri ọkpọkọ mmanụ nke Trans-Alaska ruru maịlụ 800 ka puku kwuru puku gbọmgbọm mmanụ kwafuru na ndịda Fairbanks, nke Alaska.

translation.en: A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9.
translation.ig: Ọkụ ọnyụnyụ sochitere nlekwa a na emechite anya n'ụlọ ihe gbasara ọkụ mere ka valvụ enyemaka mepee mmanụ wee gbabiga oke n'akụkụ ebe mgbapụta mmanụ nke itolu Fọt Griili.

translation.en: The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons).
translation.ig: Mmepe valvụ ahụ nyere òhèrè otu nnwereonwe nrụgide maka sistemụ ahụ ma mmanụ wụrụ na paadị gaa na taankị nwere ike ijide bareelụ 55,000 (galọn nde 2.3).

translation.en: As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank.
translation.ig: Dị ka n’ehihie Wenezdee, ụmụ oghere ikuku tankị ahụ ka na-ehi ehi o nwere ike site na ebumibu n’ihi ekpomọkụ n’ime tankị ahụ.

translation.en: Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.
translation.ig: Ebe ọzọ e ji agbanye ihe ọzọ n’okpuru olori ndị ahụ nke nwere ike ijigide barelụ 104,500 ejuchabeghị.

translation.en: The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect.
translation.ig: Okwuntukwasa ndi ahu, nke telivishon gosiri ka o na eme, bu izizi ndi isi Iran kwetere na ikike anapuru ha metutara ha.

translation.en: They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income.
translation.ig: Ihe na-esote ha bụ mgbochi otu esi emefu ego ya na iwu mmgbachibido sitere n'aka ọgbakọ nke Iroopu n'ihe gbasara mbupu n'obodo mmanụ, ebe akụnụba mba Aịranụ si enweta ego nrite si mba ọzọ pasenti iri asatọ.

translation.en: In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day.
translation.ig: N'ime akụkọ ya a na akọ n'ọnwa ọbụla nke akọrọ nso nso a, OPEC si na mbupu mmanụ n'obodo dara ada ruo ogugo nke kacha dị ala n'ime afọ iri abụọ n'ọnụ gbọmgbọm nde abụọ na asatọ kwa ụbọchị.

translation.en: The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as "a trap" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself.
translation.ig: Onye isi kacha ndị isi obodo nke obodo ahụ, onye aha ya bụ Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, kọwatara ndabere na mmanụ dị ka "ọnya" nke bidoro tupu mgbanwe okpukpe Islam n'obodo Aịraanụ n'afọ 1979 ma bụrụkwa ihe obodo kwesịrị isi na ya napụta onwe ya.

translation.en: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah.
translation.ig: Mgbe kapsụlụ ahụ bịarutere n’Ụwa ma banye mbara ụwa, n’oge ihe dị ka 5 ụtụtụ (oge ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ), a na-atụanya na ọ ga-eme otu ihe ngosi ọkụ maka ndị enyi anyị nọ na Ebe ugwu Kaifonịa, Ọregọn, Nevada, na Yutaa.

translation.en: The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky.
translation.ig: Ụgbọ ahụ ga eyi kpakpando na-agbafe n'ihu igwe.

translation.en: The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute.
translation.ig: Kapsụlụ ahụ ga na-aga njem n'ihe dịka km 12.8 maọbụ maịlụ 8 kwa ntabianya, ọsịịsọ zuru oke iji site na San Francisco ruo Los Angeles n'otu nkeji.

translation.en: Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module.
translation.ig: Stardust ga atoo ndeko oge ohuu nke oji buru ugboelu kacha agbasi ike na njem iji ilaghachite n'uwa, o ga agbawa ndeko oge atooro na onwa May nke 1969 oge isi modulu Apollo X n’alaghachite n’uwa.

translation.en: “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.
translation.ig: “Ọ ga agafe ụsọ oke osimiri ọdịda anyanwụ nke northern Kalifonia ma mukekwaa ihu igwe site na Kalifonia gafee central Ọregọn rukwaa na Nevada na Idaho ruo n'ime Utah" ka Tom Duxbury, onye bụ onye nlekọta ndị ọrụ ngo bụ Staadọst kwuru.

translation.en: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement.
translation.ig: Mkpebi Mazị Rudd ịkwado Nkwekọrita Ihu Igwe Kyoto kewapụrụ United States, mee ka ha bụrụzie naanị mba mepere-emepe nke na-agaghị akwado nkwekọrịta a.

translation.en: Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.
translation.ig: Isi ọchịchị na-achọghị mgbanwe nke gara aga nke mba Ọstrelia jụrụ ịkwado Kyoto, ha sị na ọ ga emebi akụnụba obodo n'ihi oke ndabere o nwere na mbupu coal n'obodo, mana mba dịka India na Chaịna abụghị ndị iwu oke anwụrụ jigidere.

translation.en: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history.
translation.ig: Ọ bụ ihenzụta kachasị dị elu nke ntọala ndị eBay.

translation.en: The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
translation.ig: Ụlọọrụ ahụ nwere olileanya ịgbasa ụmụ isi mmalite uru ya ma mee ka amara ya amara n’ebe Skype nwere ọkwa guzosịrị ike, dịka Chaịna, Ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Yuropu, na Brazili.

translation.en: Scientists have suspected Enceladus as geologically active and a possible source of Saturn's icy E ring.
translation.ig: Ndị ọkammụta sayensị lere Enceladus anya dịka ebe e nwere mmegharị ala ma bụrụkwa ebe enwere ike isi nweta oghoghoro E nke bụ mkpụrụ mmiri nke Saturn.

translation.en: Enceladus is the most reflective object in the solar system, reflecting about 90 percent of the sunlight that hits it.
translation.ig: Enseladus bụ ihe kachasị enwukepụ ihe na sola sistem niile; ọ na-enwukepụ ihe dị ka pasent 90 nke ọkụ niile na-abịakwasa ya.

translation.en: The game publisher Konami stated today in a Japanese newspaper that they will not be releasing the game Six Days in Fallujah.
translation.ig: Taa Konami bụ dị na-emepụta egwuregwu sịrị n'otu akwụkwọ akụkọ nke mba Japan na ha agaghị ewepụta egwuruegwu a na akpọ Ụbọchị Isii na Faluja.

translation.en: The game is based on the Second Battle of Fallujah, a vicious battle between American and Iraqi forces.
translation.ig: Egwuregwu a si n'akụkọ Agha nke Abụọ nke Fallujah, agha kara aka ndị Amị Amerịka na nke ndị Iran lụrụ.

translation.en: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website.
translation.ig: Ndi ACMA chọpụtarakwara na n'agbanyeghị na a na elere ya n'ịntaneetị, ihe onyonyoo Big Brọda emebighị iwu gbasara nyocha na mmachi ihe ngosi n'ịntaneetị maka na ihe onyonyoo ahụ abụghị ihe echekwara na webụsaịtị nke Big Brọda.

translation.en: The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.
translation.ig: Iwu Ọrụ Mgbasa ozi ahụ na-enye maka njikwa nke ndị̀na ịntaneetị, Etu ọ bụla a ga-esi echebara ndị̀na Ịntaneetị, ọ ga-ebirịrị n’anụ ahụ n’otu sava.

translation.en: The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that "extremists from Somalia" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia.
translation.ig: Ulo-nnochita-anya mba Ameriaca no na obodo Nairobi, Kenya adoola aka-na-nti na "ndi-mmeru-nisi sitere na mba Somalia" na akpa-nkata iwebata ogbunigwe na-egbu-onye-turu-ya na mba kenya na Ethiopia.

translation.en: The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up "prominent landmarks" in Ethiopia and Kenya.
translation.ig: Mba U.S sị na o nwetara ozi site n'aka onye ozi a na amaghị kwuru kpọmkwem na a ga eji ndị ogbunigwe gbuo onwe were gbarie "akara ngosi ala pụtara ihe" na mba Etiopia na Kenya.

translation.en: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988.
translation.ig: Ogologo oge tupu Di Deeli Sho na Di Kolbet Rịpọt ebido, Heck na Johnson atụọla atụmatụ maka mbipụta ga na-enye akụkọụwa ntọrọmọchị— ma na-akọ akụkọụwa— mgbe ha ka bụ ụmụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Washịntịn n'afọ 1988.

translation.en: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
translation.ig: Kemgbe mbido ya, Di Oniọn abụrụla n'eziokwu alaeze ntaakụkọ na eme ejije n'atọ ọchị, ha nwere mpaghara mbipụta, webụsaịtị nke dọtara ndị ọbịa nde ise pụrụ iche n'ọnwa Ọktoba, mgbasa ozi nke onwe, netwọkụ nke na-enye ntaakụkọ awa ọbula nke dị n'ụbọchị, pọdkastị, nakwa akwụkwọ ngosipụta ụwa a malitere nke a na akpọ Ụwa Anyị N'amaghị Ihe.

translation.en: Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat).
translation.ig: Al Gọ na Onye isi agha Tọmi Franks kwupụtara isi ntaakụko kacha masị ha n'echebaraghị ya echiche ( Nke Gọ bụ mgbe Di Onịon kpesara na ya na Tipa nwere mmekọ nwoke na nwanyị kachasị na ndụ ha ka emerichara ya na ntuliaka kekọleji ntuliaka n'afọ 2000).

translation.en: Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
translation.ig: Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị odee ha agaala n'ihu ịkpa ike di egwu n'ihe ngosi mgbasa ọzi ntọrọmọchị nke Jon Stewart na Stephen Colbert.

translation.en: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis.
translation.ig: Mmemme nka a so n'atụmatụ Bucharest Siti Họl nwere ime ka ndi mmadụ bido ịhụta isi obodo Romenia dịka ebe mara mma ma juputa na ndi okike.

translation.en: The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.
translation.ig: Obodo ahụ ga abụ nke izizi n'ọwụwa anyanwụ ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Iroopu nke ga bụ onye nnabata na mmeme KawụParedị, mmeme nka ọha kachasị ukwu n'ụwa n'ile, n'etiti ọnwa Juunu na Ọgọstụ nke afọ a.

translation.en: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages.
translation.ig: Ọmụma ọkwa nke taa gbatịkwuru ruo na nkwa gọọmenti kwere n'ọnwa Maachị nke afọ a itinyekwu ego inweta ụgbọ okporoígwè kemgbako.

translation.en: An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.
translation.ig: Narị atọ a gbakwunyere ọzọ na-eweta mkpokọta ya ruo ụgbọ ibu otu puku na narị atọ a ga-enweta iji belata oke njupụta.

translation.en: Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism.
translation.ig: Kristofa Gashia, onye nkwuchite okwu ngalaba uwe ojii nke Lọs Anjeles, sị na nwoke ahụ nke a na enyocha gbasara mmebi iwu bụ maka njehie oke m'ọbụghị maka mmebi ihe.

translation.en: The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the "O" to read lowercase "e".
translation.ig: Ihe ịrịba ama ahụ emerụghị ahụ kèahùrụanya; Emere mgbanwe ahụ site n'iji tarpaulins achọrọ mma n'iji akara nke udo na obi iji gbanwee "O" ahụ ka ọ gụọ mkpụrụedemede ntà "e".

translation.en: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism.
translation.ig: Ihe n’ebute taid n’acha uhie uhie bu oke Karenia brevis, otu single-celled organism n’agba na mmiri.

translation.en: Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically.
translation.ig: Ihe okike nwere ike ịgbagha onwe ha iweta maka ezigbo ọnọdụ, nke ga eme ka nje a bụ alge mụbaa n'ụzọ dị egwu.

translation.en: The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish.
translation.ig: Algee na-emepụta nsi nke akwara ozi nke nwere ike ịgbanyụ akwara na ma mmadụ ma azụ.

translation.en: Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters.
translation.ig: Azụ na anwụkwarị n'ihi ọnọdụ nsi dị oke elu n'ime mmiri.

translation.en: Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.
translation.ig: Nke a nwere ike imetụta ndị mmadụ site n'ikuru mmiri o metụtara nke oke ikuku na ebili bugara n'ikuku.

translation.en: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) .
translation.ig: Na nkacha elu ya, Ajọ ifufe Ebe okpomọkụ Gonu, agụrụ aha maka akpa nke akụkwọ osisi nkwụ n’ime asụsụ nke ndị Maldives, rutere ifufe nọgidesịrị ike nke kilomita 240 kwa awa (maịlị 149 kwa awa) .

translation.en: By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.
translation.ig: Ka ọ na-erule mbido taa, ikuku dị ihe dịka 83km/awa, ma a na-atụkwa anya na ọ ga-eme ka ọ na-agbada.

translation.en: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19.
translation.ig: Na Wenezdee, Nashọnal Basketbọl Asosieshọn (NBA) nke Amerịka kwụsịrị ogbe egwuregwu basketbọl ya maka egwu gbasara COVID-19.

translation.en: The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.
translation.ig: NBA kpebiri nke a ka onye egwuregwu Utah Jazz butere ọrịa COVID-19.

translation.en: "Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence.
translation.ig: Ma adabere n'ọkpụkpụ a, ọputara na nkewa ahụ mere n'oge karịa ka ihe nchọpụta ahụrụ anya tụwara anya.

translation.en: That means everything has to be put back," said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw.
translation.ig: Nke a pụtara na a ga-etighachirịrị ihe niile, onye nyocha na Rift Valley Research Service na Ethiopia nakwa onye so dee nlebaanya a, Berhane Asfaw kwuru nke a.

translation.en: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States.
translation.ig: Ruo ugbua, AOL enweele ike kpalie ma melite ahịa IM ka osiri chọ, n'ihi otu osiri zuo ọha onụ n'ime mba Yunaịted Steeti.

translation.en: With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end.
translation.ig: N’inwe mkwado a n’ọnọdụ, nnwereonwe a nwere ike ịgwụ.

translation.en: The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.
translation.ig: Ọnụọgụgụ mmadụ ndị ojiji ọrụ Yahuu! na Maịkrosọftụ ejikọta ha ga-… ọnụọgụgụ ndị ahịa AOL.

translation.en: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government.
translation.ig: Emere ụlọ akụ Northern Rock nke obodo na 2008 mgbe achọpụtara na ụlọ ọrụ a natara nkwado ihe mberede n'aka Gọọmentị UK.

translation.en: Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007.
translation.ig: Northern Rock chọburu nkwado maka mkpughepụ ya n'oge ọdụdọ nyefee ego mgbazinye ụlọ dị ọnụ ala na 2007.

translation.en: Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation.
translation.ig: Otu Vejini nke Nnaukwu Richard Branson kweburu ụlọakụ ahụ ọnụ nke ndị nwe ụlọakụ ahụ anabataghị tupu e mee ụlọakụ ahụ nke mba nwe.

translation.en: In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management).
translation.ig: N’afọ 2010, mgbe ọ ka bụ nke mba, e si na "ụlọ akụ ọjọọ" Northern Rock (Nkekọta Akụ) wee kewapụ ụlọ akụ dị ugbu a na high street Northern Rock plc.

translation.en: Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
translation.ig: Vejịn egorola naanị 'ezigbo ụlọ akụ' nke Nọden Rọk; ọ bụghị ụlọ ọrụ ndozi akụ ya.

translation.en: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth.
translation.ig: Ekweere na nke a bụ oge nke ise n'akụkọ ihe mere eme ndị mmadụ na-ahụ ihe emechaara chọpụta site na nyochapụta ihe kemịstrị na ọbụ ihe si n'ụwa Maas daa n'ụwa anyị.

translation.en: Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin.
translation.ig: N'ime ihe dị ka okwute si eluigwe 24,000 ama ama dara na ụwa, naanị ihe dị ka 34 ka egosiri na ha bụ ndị nwere mbido Martian.

translation.en: Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July.
translation.ig: N’ime okwute ndi a, asiri na iri na ise si na meterorite si na igwe daa n’onwa Julai gara aga.

translation.en: Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.
translation.ig: Ụfọdụ okwute ahụ, ndị dị oke ụkọ n’Ụwa, bụ ndị a na-ere site na US$11,000 ruo $22,500 kwa aunsị, nke bụ ihe dị ka ugboro iri karịa ọnụahịa nke ọlaedo.

translation.en: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points.
translation.ig: Ka agbasiri oso a, Keselowski nwere onuogugu 2,250 nke mere oji buru onye isi na egwuregwu okwo ugbo.

translation.en: Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243.
translation.ig: Onye nke mbụ ji pọyịnt asaa gafee Jọnsịn, onye nke abụọ gbatara pọyịnt 2243.

translation.en: In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points.
translation.ig: Dịka onye nke atọ, Hamlin ji pọyịnt iri abụọ nọrọ n'azụ, mana o ji ise nọrọ n'ihu Bowyer. Kahne na Truex, Jr. bụ ndị nke ise na isii n'otu n'otu ma nwee pọyịnt 2,220 na 2,207.

translation.en: Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.
translation.ig: Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth na Harvick mejuru onodu iri kachasi maka egwuregwu okwo ugbo tinyere na o bu so oso ano foro n’oge a.

translation.en: The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident.
translation.ig: Ndị agha mmiri mba US sị na ha na-eleba anya n'ihe mere.

translation.en: They also said in a statement, "The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship".
translation.ig: Ha kwukwara n'ozi ha zipuru, "Otu a nọ n'ọrụ ugbu a ịchọpụta usoro ga-akachasị mma iji wepụta ụgbọ mmiri a".

translation.en: An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan.
translation.ig: Avenger class mine na emesho ugbommiri, ugbommiri ahu n’aga Puerto Princessa na Palawan.

translation.en: It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan.
translation.ig: E kenyere ya ụgbọagha nke asaa nke ndị agha mmiri Amerịka nọ na Sasebo, Nagasaki dị na Japan.

translation.en: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel.
translation.ig: Ndị mwakpọ Mumbaị ahụ jiri ụgbọmmiri wee bịa na Nọvemba 26, 2008, ha ji ogbunigwe nta, ngwaagha kemmerenonwe bịa ma gbata ọtụtụ ebe nke gụnyere ọdụ ụgbọokporoigwe Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus ndi mmadu juru na Ụlọ nkwari akụ Taj Mahal ama ama.

translation.en: David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba.
translation.ig: Ọchịchọ na mkpokọta ozi nke David Headley enyerela aka ime ka arụmarụ ahụ nwee ike site n’aka ụmụ nwoke ndị ji egbe iri si n’otu militantị nke Pakịstan Laskhar-e-Taiba.

translation.en: The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.
translation.ig: Mbuso agha ahụ tinyere nnukwu nghọtahie n'etiti India na Pakịstan.

translation.en: Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety.
translation.ig: Ndị ọrụ ndị ahụ sonyere ya, o kwere ndị obodo texas na a na-esoro usoro ichedo obodo na ọha.

translation.en: Perry specifically said, "There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."
translation.ig: Perry kwuru hoo haa, "O nwere ebe ole na ole n’ụwa ndị ka dị kwadobe ịnagide ihe ịma aka a bịaranụ."

translation.en: The governor also stated, "Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."
translation.ig: Onye n'achị steeti sịkwara na, "Taa, anyị mụtara na ụfọdụ ụmụaka ruru ogo ịgụ akwụkwọ bụ ndị achọpụtara na ha na onye ọrịa ahụ nwere mmekọ."

translation.en: He went on to say, "This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."
translation.ig: Ọ gara n’ihu ikwu, "Okwu a dị mkpa. Kwere nkwa anyị na sistemụ anyị na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma dị ka etu o kwesịrị."

translation.en: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi.
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ eziokwu, nchọta ahụ mezuru afọ asatọ nke Allen chọrọ Musashi.

translation.en: Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV.
translation.ig: Site na’usoro imepụta maapụ nke akwa osimiri eji ROV were chota ihe mebisiri.

translation.en: One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.
translation.ig: Akoro si n’otu n’ime ndi kasi baa ogaranya n’uwa, Allen etinyela nnukwu oke aku n’uba ya n’ime oru nchoputa ihe no na mmiri iji bido icho Musashi maka nnukwu aguu onwere gbasara agha.

translation.en: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education.
translation.ig: O nwetara otuto dị oke mkpa n'oge ya n'Atlanta ma bụrụ onye a họpụtara ma kwanyere ugwu maka ihe ọmụmụ uche-ọhụrụ nke mmepe obodo.

translation.en: In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year.
translation.ig: Na 2009 enyere ya okwa National Superintendent nke afo ahụ.

translation.en: At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores.
translation.ig: N'oge onyinye ahụ, ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị dị na Atlanta ahụla oke mmelite n'akara ule.

translation.en: Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results.
translation.ig: N'oge n'eteghị aka, ndị ode akwụkwọ Atlanta depụtara akwụkwọ nke n'egosi nsogbu n'akara ule.

translation.en: The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings.
translation.ig: Nkọwapụta ihe a chọpụtara gosiri na akara ule gbalitere ọsịịsọ nọkwara na-arụtụ aka na-asị na ụlọakwụkwọ ahụ choputara n'ime onwe na e nwere nsogbu mana ha emeghi ihe ọbụla gbasara ihe ha chọpụtara.

translation.en: Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.
translation.ig: Ihe akaebe mechara gosi na emetụrụ akwụkwọ ule ndị ahụ aka. A mara Hall, ya na ndị ụlọ ọrụ mmụta ndị ọzọ 34 ikpe na 2013.

translation.en: The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation.
translation.ig: Gọọmentị mba Ireland na-adọ aka na ntị maka mkpa ọ dị ka ndị omeiwu dozie ọnọdụ ahụ.

translation.en: "It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible", said a government spokesperson.
translation.ig: Onye nkwuchite goomenti kwuru si na o dikwazi mkpa site na anya ahu ike oha n’eze ma ikpe mpu na aga eti iwu a ozugbo enwere ike.

translation.en: The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect.
translation.ig: Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka Ahụike gosiri nchegbu ya maka ọdịmma nke ndị mmadụ ndị gbasoro uru nwa oge nta dị na nnabata ọgwụ ike ndị ahụ, ma maka amamikpe ndị nke metụtara ọgwụ e nyefere kamgbe mgbanwe ndị na-abụghịzi iwu ugbu a banyere n'ọrụ.

translation.en: Jarque was practicing during pre-season training at Coverciano in Italy earlier in the day. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia.
translation.ig: Jarque nọbụrụ na-emewa ọzụzụ egwuregwu tupu-oge na Coverciano na Itali na mbụ n’ụbọchị. Ọ nọbụrụ na họteelụ òtù ahụ n’ọdịnihu otu egwuregwu atụrụ arọ ya maka Sọnde megide Bolonia.

translation.en: He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia.
translation.ig: Ọ nọbu n'ụlọ oriri na nkwari nke ndị otu ya na-akwado maka egwuregwu ha ga-agbasị Bolonia ezubere maka ụbọchị Sọnde.

translation.en: The bus was headed to Six Flags St. Louis in Missouri for the band to play to a sold-out crowd.
translation.ig: Ụgbọala ahụ na-aga Six Flags St. Louis nọ na Missouri ka otu egwu ga tiere igwe mmadụ kwụrụla ụgwọ egwu.

translation.en: At 1:15 a.m. Saturday, according to witnesses, the bus was going through a green light when the car made a turn in front of it.
translation.ig: Na elekere 1:15 nke ụtụtụ Saturday, dịka ndị akaebe kwuru, Bọọsụ ahụ na-agafere ọkụ na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ mgbe ụgbọ ala ahụ mere otu ntụgharị n'ihu ya.

translation.en: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian.
translation.ig: N'abalị Ọgọọst 9, anya oke ikuku Mọrakọt fọrọ kilomita iri asaa ka o ruo mpaghara Chaịna a na-akpọ Fujian.

translation.en: The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.
translation.ig: Ezubere oke ikuku ahụ ji ọsọ n'ogugo 11kph agbaje ụzọ Chaịna.

translation.en: Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat.
translation.ig: E nyere ndị njem mmiri dịka ha na-eche n'okpuru okpomọkụ ruru digrii 90(F).

translation.en: Fire captain Scott Kouns said, "It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s.
translation.ig: Onyeisi ọkụ Scott Kouns kwuru, "Ọ bụ ụbọchị dị ọkụ n’ime Santa Clara ya na okpomọkụ nọ na 90s.

translation.en: Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."
translation.ig: Ogologo oge ọ bụla a tọrọ atọ n’igwe na-agba okirikiri ga-abụ ihe adighi nma, ikwu ntakịrị, o wee dịkarịa ala otu awa iji wepụta onye mbụ n'ụgbọ ahụ."

translation.en: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa.
translation.ig: Schumacher onye lara ezmuike-nka na afo 2006 mgbe otuchaara ugo na asoroma-mpi Fomula 1 ugboro asaa, di njikere inochi Felipe Massa meruru-ahu.

translation.en: The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
translation.ig: Onye Brazil a merụrụ ahụ n'isi mgbe moto ya kpọkasịrị n'ọsọ moto Grand Prix 2009 na Họngarị.

translation.en: Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.
translation.ig: Oge e ruola Massa ịpụta ma opekata mpe ọ bụrụ ruo oge 2009 fọdụrụ.

translation.en: Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said.
translation.ig: Arias nyochatara na o butere nje ahụ n'oke dị obere, Onye Ozi Nke Onye Isi Ala Rodrigo Arias kwuru.

translation.en: The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days.
translation.ig: Ọnọdụ ahụike onyeisiala adịla mma, mana ọ ka ga-anọpụ anọpụ ruo ọtụtụ abalị.

translation.en: "Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting.
translation.ig: Ewepu ahuoku na akpiri n’egbu m mgbu, ahu di m enwere m ike iru oru site na telecommuting.

translation.en: I expect to return to all my duties on Monday," Arias said in a statement.
translation.ig: Ana m ele anya ịlaghachi n'ọrụ m niile n'ụbọchị Mọnde", Arịas kwuru n'ozi ya.

translation.en: Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday.
translation.ig: Felicia bu bu oke ifufe nke udi 4 na okwa onuogugu ajo ifufe nke Saffir-Simpson, mana o dara buruzia obere ifufe nke ana akpo tropikal depression tupu odajuo ubochi Tuzdee.

translation.en: Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported.
translation.ig: Ihe fọdụrụ na ya butere maka mmiri ozizo n'ọtụtụ isuo, mana enwebeghị mkpesa ide mmiri m'ọbụ mmebi ihe.

translation.en: The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as "beneficial".
translation.ig: Ekowara ugwu ahụ, ruru sentimita 6.34 na inchi n’ogologo na Oahu, dịka akọwara dịka ‘ihe bara uru’.

translation.en: Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning.
translation.ig: Ụfọdụ mmiri ozuzo ahụ bụ nke égbè eluigwe na àmụmà ugboro ugboro sonyere.

translation.en: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already.
translation.ig: Ejima Otter ahụ anwagidela ifeda ala na Kokoda ụnyaahụ dị ka Ndị ụgbọ elu PNG Flight CG4684, mana a kwụsigo otu ugboro na mbụ.

translation.en: About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared.
translation.ig: Ihe dịka nkeji iri tupu oge a kara n'ọga erute site n'ọbịbịa nke abụọ ya o fesasịa.

translation.en: The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors.
translation.ig: A chọtara ebe mkpọka ahụ taa ma ọ nweghịkwa nnwetaòhèrè iru ya nke mere ka tụba ndị uwe ojii abụọ n'oké ọhịa ka ewere ije ruo ebe ahụ wee chọọ ndị nwụfọrọ.

translation.en: The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.
translation.ig: Otu ihu igwe ọjọọ nke kpatara ọdịda nlotu ahụ gbochikwara ọchịchọ ahụ.

translation.en: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak.
translation.ig: Dị ka akụkọ kwuru, otu ụlọ n'ama Makbet gbariri n'ihi ohihi ikuku eji esi nri.

translation.en: An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak.
translation.ig: Onye-oru ulo-oru mmanu-oku gas no na nzaghachi na ogige ahu mgbe otu onye-agbata-obi kpochara banyere mmiputa nke mmanu-oku gas.

translation.en: When the official arrived, the apartment exploded.
translation.ig: Mgbe onye si n'ụlọ ọrụ bịara, nkewa ụlọ ahụ enwuru ọkụ.

translation.en: No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock.
translation.ig: O nweghị nnukwu mmerụ ahụ akọrọ, mana o pekata mpe ọ bụrụ mmadụ ise nọ n’ebe ahụ mgbe ihe mgbawa ahụ gbawara ka agwọrọ maka mgbaàmà nkụja.

translation.en: No one was inside the apartment.
translation.ig: Onweghi onye nọbụrụ n’ime ulo

translation.en: At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
translation.ig: N’oge ahụ, ihe fọrọ obere ka o ruo 100 ndị bi ebe ahụ ka a kpọkpụrụ site n’ebe ahụ.

translation.en: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games.
translation.ig: Ma gọlfụ na rọgbi adịla njikere ịbịaghachi n'egwuregwu Olimpik.

translation.en: The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics.
translation.ig: Kọmitii Olimpik nke ụwa niile tụrụ ụtụ itinye egwuregwu ahụ n'ọgbakọ ndị isi ha n'obodo Belịn taa. Egwuregwu Rugbi, njikọ n'ahụ maka rugbi kpọmkwem, na gọlf ka ahọọrọ n'ime egwuregwu ise ndị ọzọ ka a ga atụle ma ọ ga eso na Olimpik.

translation.en: Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005.
translation.ig: Egwuregwu skwash, karate na rola spọts nwakwara ịbanye na mmemme Olympic yana bezbọọlụ na sọftbọọlụ, ndị e si n'Egwuregwu Olympic wepụ n'afọ 2005.

translation.en: The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.
translation.ig: IOC n'uju ya ga akwadorịrị ụtụ ahụ n'ọgbakọ Ọktoba ha na Kopenhagen.

translation.en: Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks.
translation.ig: Ọbụghị mmadụ niile kwadoro ntinye ụmụ nwanyị n'ọkwa.

translation.en: 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, "Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."
translation.ig: Amir Khan onye meritere onyinye ọla ọcha na Olimpik e mere na 2004 sị, "n'ala ala obi m echere m na ụmụnwanyị ekwesịghị ịlụ ọgụ. Nke ahụ bụ echiche m."

translation.en: Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London.
translation.ig: Agbanyeghị ihe ndị o kwuburu, ọ sị na ọ ga-akwado ndị egwuregwu Briten na 2012 Olimpiks a na-eme na Lọndọn.

translation.en: The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3.
translation.ig: E kpere ikpe ahụ n’Ụlọ Ikpe Birmingham Crown ma kpechaa ya na Ọgọst 3.

translation.en: The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people.
translation.ig: Onye nta akụkọ, nke a nwụdoro n'ebe ihe mere, gọnarịrị mwakpọ ahụ ma sị na o ji polu ahụ were chekwaa onwe ya site na ụmụ karama a na-atụ ya site n'aka ndị ruru ndị mmadụ iri na atọ.

translation.en: Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice.
translation.ig: Ikpe sokwere maa Blake maka ịnwa ibugharị usoro ikpe ziri ezi.

translation.en: The judge told Blake it was "almost inevitable" he was going to be sent to jail.
translation.ig: Onye oka-ikpe ahu gwara Blake na obu “ohere kariri na onweghi-ihe mgbochi” na ana aga itinye ya na nga.

translation.en: Dark energy is a completely invisible force that is constantly acting upon the universe.
translation.ig: Ikike Ojii bụ ike anaghị ahụ anya, nke na-arụ ọrụ n'ụwa kwa mgbe.

translation.en: Its existence is known only because of its effects on the expansion of the universe.
translation.ig: Naanị ihe e ji mara na ihe dị otu a dị bụ maka ihe ọ na-eme na mmụba igwe na ala. .

translation.en: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly.
translation.ig: Ndị ọka mmụta sayensị achọpụtala ihe dịka ala nke gbasara n'ihu onwa nke akpọrọ lobet skaps nke nwere ike ịbụ ihe sitere n'ọnwa ịchịkọta nwayọ nwayọ.

translation.en: These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent.
translation.ig: Skap ndị a ka achọpụtara gburugburu ọnwa ha dịkwa ka ihe ribatụrụ eriba, nke na-egosi na ihe mmegharị ala kpatara ya eteghị aka omere.

translation.en: This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.
translation.ig: Atụtụ a na-emegide atụmatụ na-akọwa na o nweghi  ihe mmegharị ala nke n'eme n'ọnwa.

translation.en: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd.
translation.ig: Nwoke ahụ kwọrọ n'ebubo ụgbọ ala nwere ụkwụ atọ eji ihe mgbawa gasị jikere kwaba n'ime igwe mmadụ.

translation.en: The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast.
translation.ig: Ejidere onye echere na ọbụ ya gbasuru ogbunigwe ahụ, ka omerụchara ahụ n'ihi mgbari ogbunigwe ahụ.

translation.en: His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
translation.ig: Ndị isi amatabeghi aha ya, mana ha ma na ọ bụ onye otu agbụrụ Uigọọ.

translation.en: Nadia, born on September 17, 2007, by Cesarean section at a maternity clinic in Aleisk, Russia, weighed in at a massive 17 pounds 1 ounce.
translation.ig: Nadia, amụrụ na Septemba 17, 2007, site n'Iwa afọ n'otu ụlọ ọgwụ ndị nne nọ na Aleisk, Rọshịa, nwere nnukwu ibu bụ 17 paụnd 1 ounce.

translation.en: "We were all simply in shock," the mother stated.
translation.ig: Nne ha kwuru sị, “Anyị niile nọ nnọọ na mgbagwojuanya”.

translation.en: When asked what the father said, she answered "He couldn't say a thing - he just stood there blinking."
translation.ig: Mgbe a jụrụ ya ihe nna kwuru, ọ zara “O nwenwughị ike ikwu otu ihe - ọ dị nnọọ kwụrụ ebe ahụ na-atabianya.”

translation.en: "It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is.
translation.ig: Ona aga ikpa-agwa ka mmiri. ana-ahu site nime ya dika esi emekwa na mmiri.

translation.en: So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom.
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ na ị kwụrụ n'ụsọ mmiri, ị ga enwe ike ịhụ okwute maọbụ unyi dị n'ala ya.

translation.en: As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth," added Stofan.
translation.ig: Ka anyị madebere, sọ otu ụwa na-egosi ọtụtụ ike karịa Taịtan, ma aha ya bụ Earth" Stofan tinyere.

translation.en: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards.
translation.ig: Nsogbu bidoro n'ụbọchị Jenụwarị 1 mgbe ọtụtụ ndị bi n'ebe ahụ bidoro bawa mba n'ụlọọrụ nzipụ ozi nke Obanazawa na ha enwetabeghi ozi ha na-enwetawa oge afọ ọhụrụ.

translation.en: Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.
translation.ig: Ụnyaahụ, ụlọ ọrụ nzipụ wepụtara arịrịọ mgbaghara ha nye ụmụ amaala na ndị mgbasa ozi mgbe ha chọpụtara na nwata nwoke ahụ zochiri akwụkwọ nzipu ozi karịrị narị isii, gụnyere akwukwo ozi Afọ Ọhụrụ narị anọ na iri abụọ na itoolu, nke ndị a na-enyefebeghị ndị nnata ha bu n’obi.

translation.en: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole.
translation.ig: Igwe nfegharị ọnwa a na-akpọ Chandrayaan-1 nke mmadụ anọghị nyụpụrụ Moon Impact Probe (MIP) ya n'ike, nke gbafere elu ọnwa n'ọsọ kilomita 1.5 kwa nkeji (kilomita 3000 kwa awa), wee mechaa kpọkasịa na nso Ọwụwa Anyanwụ nke ọnwa.

translation.en: Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.
translation.ig: Karịa ngwa sayensị atọ dị mkpa o bu, ụgbọ nchọpụta ihu ọnwa bukwa onyonyo ọkọlọtọ nke obodo india, nke etere ka agba n'akụkụ ya nile.

translation.en: "Thanks for those who supported a convict like me," Siriporn was quoted as saying at a press conference.
translation.ig: Ana m ekele ndị kwadoro onye amagoro ikpe dịka m, Siriporn kwuru n'otu nzukọ ndị nta akụkọ.

translation.en: "Some may not agree but I don't care.
translation.ig: "Ụfọdụ nwere ike ha agaghị ekwe mana achoghị m ịma.

translation.en: I am happy that there are people willing to support me.
translation.ig: Obị dị m ụtọ na o nwere ndị chọrọ ịkwado m.

translation.en: Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed "Political Agents" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas.
translation.ig: Kemgbe nwere onwe obodo Pakịstan n'aka ọchịchị Briten na 1947, onye isi obodo Pakịstan ahọpụtala "Ndị ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị" ịchị FATA, ndị ọfọdụrụ ka ha nwee ike ọchịchị kpamkpam n'ebe ndị ahụ.

translation.en: These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution.
translation.ig: Ndị ọrụ ndị a na-ahụ maka ịnye ụmụ ọrụ gọọmentị na ìkpé ikpe n'okpuru Nkeji edemede narị abụọ na iri anọ na asaa nke Iwu Pakistan.

translation.en: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time.
translation.ig: Ebe obibi na Mecca dara na, ebe di nso ndi alakuba n’elekere 10 nke ututu oge obodo anyi.

translation.en: The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage.
translation.ig: Ụfọdụ ndị njem ala nsọ bịara ịhụ obodo nsọ n'abalị na-esote hajj nọrọ n'ụlọ a.

translation.en: The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates.
translation.ig: Ndị na-abịakarị n'ụlọ mbinigwe ahụ bụ ndị mba Yunaịtedị Arabụ Emireti.

translation.en: The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.
translation.ig: Onu ogugu ndi nwuru-anwu di opekata-mpe 15, onu ogugu bu nke ana atu-anya na oga agbago.

translation.en: Leonov, also known as "cosmonaut No. 11", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts.
translation.ig: Leonov, onye a makwaara dịka "ọganambaraigwe nke 11", sobu n'otu ndị na-aga na mbara igwe mbụ nke Sọviyetị Yunịọnụ.

translation.en: On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or "spacewalk", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes.
translation.ig: Na Machị 18, 1965, o mere ihe omume kemgbagharị ụgbọ (EVA) mbụ, maọbụ "njem n'eluigwe", ebe ọ nọọrọ naanị ya na mpụta ụgbọ elu ahụ ruo nkeji iri na abụọ.

translation.en: He received the "Hero of the Soviet Union", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work.
translation.ig: Ọ natara “Dike nke Òtù Soviet ahụ”, ugwu nke Òtù Soviet kachasị elu, maka ọrụ ya.

translation.en: Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over.
translation.ig: Ka afọ iri gachara, o duuru ngalaba Sọviet nke ozi Apolo Soyuz nke gosiri na ọsọ gbasara oghere mpụga uwa eruola na njedebe.

translation.en: She said, "There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently.
translation.ig: O kwuru, "Enweghị ihe ọmụma na-atụ aka na a ga-enwe mwakpo mgbe na-adịghị anya.

translation.en: However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."
translation.ig: Kama mweda nke ogugo iyi egwu ruo ogugo siri ike apụtaghị na ihe iyi egwu nile agaala."

translation.en: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI.
translation.ig: Ka ndị isi na-atụgharị uche gbasara ntụkwasị obi n'ihe iyi egwu ahụ, ndị ọchịchị njem Meriland mechiri njem site na nkwado FBI.

translation.en: Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours.
translation.ig: E jiri ụmụ wongworo mkpofu igbochi ụmụ mbata tuubu ma enyemaka nke ndị uwe ojii 80 nọ anọ iduzi ndị na-anya ụgbọ ala n’ụzọ ndị ọzọ.

translation.en: There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.
translation.ig: Anụghị akụkọ maka ogbugbu oge ọbụla mere na beltwee, okporo ụzọ nke ọzọ obodo a nwere.

translation.en: Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit.
translation.ig: Naịjiria kwuputara n'oge gara aga na ọtụrụ atụmatụ isonye AfCFTA n'izuka tupu ọgbakọ ahụ

translation.en: AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join.
translation.ig: Albert Muchunga, bụ onye isi ire ahịa n'ụlọ ọrụ AU kwuputara na Benin ga esonye.

translation.en: The commissioner said, "We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020".
translation.ig: Onye kọmishọna kwuru, "Anyị enwebeghị nkwekọrịta maka iwu nke ebe mmepụta na mwepụ ụgwọ mbubata, mana atụmatụ anyị nwere zuru oke iji malite zụwa ahịa na Julaị 1, 2020".

translation.en: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk.
translation.ig: Ọdụ ụgbọ nọ n’eluụwa ahụ nọgidere na-akpa àgwà, n'agbanyeghị ofufu gyroscope na mbụ na ozi ọdụ ụgbọ nọ n’eluụwa, ruo na njedebe nke ịga ije n’elu ụwa.

translation.en: Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters.
translation.ig: Chiao na Sharipov kwuru na ha nọ n'oteaka ngwa ndozi arimelu.

translation.en: Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.
translation.ig: Mgbe ndị Rọshia si n'ala ahazi ihe tinyere ụgbọelu ndị ahụ n'ọrụ, steshọn ebido kpawa ezi agwa ọzọ.

translation.en: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges.
translation.ig: Ekpere ikpe ahụ na Vejinia n'ihi n'ọbụ ọnọdụ isi nweta ịntanetị bụ AOL, bụ ụlọọrụ wetara mkpesa ndị ahụ.

translation.en: This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.
translation.ig: Nke a bụ mbụ a na-ekpe mmadụ ikpe site n'iji iwu enyere na 2003 iji gbochie e-mail igwe, nke a na-akpọ spam, na mgbasa ruo n'ime igbe ozi ndị na-achọghị ya.

translation.en: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million.
translation.ig: Jesus di afo 21 sonyere Manchester City afo gara aga na Januari 2017 o si Klub Brazil ana akpo Palmeiras k’akuko siko akwuru nde £27.

translation.en: Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.
translation.ig: Kemgbe ahụ, onye Brazil a agbaala n'egwuregwu 53 maka klọb a n'asọmpi niile ma yọọ gol 24.

translation.en: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill.
translation.ig: Dr. Lee gosikwara nchegbu ya banyere akụkọ kwuru na ụmụaka nọ na Tọki eburula ọrịa A(H5N1) evian influenza vaịrụs n'adaghị ọrịa.

translation.en: Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted.
translation.ig: O kwuru na nchọpụta ụfọdụ na-akọwa na ọrịa ahụ agaghị enwecha ike ibute ọnwụ tupu o bute ntiwapụ ọrịa n'ụwa dum.

translation.en: There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.
translation.ig: E nwere nchegbu na ndị ọrịa nwere ike ị gaa n’ihu na-ebufekwu ndị mmadụ ọzọ ọrịa ahụ site na ịga n’omume ha na eme kwa ụbọchị ma ọ bụrụ na mgbaàmà flu ahụ nọgidesie ike.

translation.en: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation.
translation.ig: Leslie Aun, onye nkwuchite maka otu enyemaka Komen, kwuru na otu ahụ webatara iwu ọhụrụ nke anaghị enye ohere ego enyemaka ma ọ bụ nnyemego ka enye ya ụmụ otu ndị nọ n’okpuru nnyocha iwu.

translation.en: Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns.
