translation.en: Many buildings are quite beautiful to look at and the view from a tall building or from a cleverly-positioned window can be a beauty to behold.
translation.ig: Ọtụtụ ụlọ na-ama mma ile anya ma isi na nnukwu ụlọelu maọbụ site na windo e dobere nke ọma nwere ike ịbụ ihe dị mma ile anya.

translation.en: Architecture overlaps considerably with other fields including urban planning, civil engineering, decorative arts, interior design and landscape design.
translation.ig: Imewe ọrụrụ ụlọ gwakọtara nke ukwuu na ogige ndị ọzọ gụnyere ịtụ atụmatụ obodo, mmụta sịvịl injinịa, ụmụ nka eji achọ mma, imewe ime ụlọ na imewe odida obodo.

translation.en: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe.
translation.ig: Ka ebe ahụ siri dị ọtụtụ ndị pueblos bụgasị, ị gaghị enwe ike ịchọta etu ndụ abalị ebe ahụ siri dị ma ọbụghị ma ị gara n’Albuquerque maọbụ Santa Fe.

translation.en: However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe).
translation.ig: N'agbanyeghị nke a, ọfọrọ obere ka kasino nile edepụtara na enye mmanya, ọtụtụ n'ime ha na ewebata ihe nlereanya amaara amaara (karịchaa ndị nọ Abụkuki na Santa Fe nso).

translation.en: Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out.
translation.ig: Uche gị dị ya: ụlọ mmanya ndị obere abụghị ebe dị mma ka onye mbịa mbịa nọrọ.

translation.en: For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.
translation.ig: Ugwu Niu Megziko nwere nnukwu nsogbu gbasara ịnya moto n'oge mmanya obubu, na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị ọkwọ ụgbọala mmanya na-egbu ka nkụ na nsonso ụmụ obere ụlọ mmanya nọ n'obodo.

translation.en: Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti.
translation.ig: Ihe eserese na ahuaja maobu idegheri ana achoghi bu ihe amaara dika ide ihe na ahu aja.

translation.en: While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint.
translation.ig: N'agbanyeghị na obidoghị taa, ọtụtụ mmadụ nwere ike itunyenyere ya ndị ntorobịa ji agba na-emebi ihe ọha na nke onye.

translation.en: However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and "legal" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags.
translation.ig: Kaosinadị, ụbọchị ugbu a e nwere ọtụtụ omenkà eserese ewubere, emume eserese ga n’ọgbà "iwu" gasị. Etemụàgbà eserese n’ọnọdụ a mgbe ụfọdụ na-egosipụta ǹkàọrụ karịa igosi ụmụ taagị ezighi ezi.

translation.en: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire.
translation.ig: Ịtụ atụ nke boomerang bụ nka ama ama nke ọtụtụ ndị njem nleta chọrọ inweta.

translation.en: If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning.
translation.ig: Ọbụrụ na ị chọrọ ịmụta ka esi atụ bumerang nke na alaghachikwute gị ma Ị tụpụ ya, gbalịa hụ na Ị nwere nke na alaghachikwute alaghachikwute.

translation.en: Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy
translation.ig: Oka-na-onuogugu igba-okirikiri di na mba Australia bu n’ezie nke na anaghi alaghachi azu. Okacha nma nke ndi n’ebido-ebido ghara inwa itubata ikuku.

translation.en: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground.
translation.ig: A na-esi Nri Hangi n’ime olulu dị ọkụ nọ n’ime ala.

translation.en: The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot.
translation.ig: A na-eji okwute si n'ọkụ eme ka olulu a dị ọkụ, maọbụ n'ụfọdụ ebe ọkụ si n'ime ala n'eme ka ala dị ọkụ n'onwe ya.

translation.en: The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner.
translation.ig: A na-ejikarị hangi ahụ isi nri abalị otu ụdị ahụrụahụ keọdịnala.

translation.en: Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.
translation.ig: Ọtụtụ ebe na Rotorua na enye jiotemal hangi, mana enwere ike ilele hangi ndị ọzọ na Kraịstchọch, Wellịntụn na ebe ndị ọzọ.

translation.en: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class).
translation.ig: MetroReel nwere ngalaba abụọ n'ụgbọ oloko njem n'ime ma na gburugburu Kep Taụn: MetroPlọs (nke a na akpọkwa ngalaba nke izizi) na Metro (nke a na akpọ ngalaba nke atọ).

translation.en: MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe.
translation.ig: MetroPlus ka mma maka ezumike ma nwekwaa ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ pere mpe karịa, mana ọ dịtụ ọnụ karịa; n'agbanyeghi, ọ ka dị ọnụ ala karịa akwụkwọ njem metro na Yurop.

translation.en: Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.
translation.ig: Ụgbọ oloko ọ bụla nwere ma MetroPlus ma Koochi gasị; koochi MetroPlus ndị ahụ na-anọkarị n’ọdụ nke ụgbọ oloko kacha nso na Cape Town.

translation.en: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders.
translation.ig: Ị na-ebe maka ndị ọzọ - Ekwela ka anya gị pụọ n’akpa gị, tụmadị mgbe ị na-agafe oke ala mba ndị ọzọ.

translation.en: You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble.
translation.ig: I ga-ahụtali onwe gị ebe e ji gị eme onye na-ebu ọgwụ n’amaghị ụma, nke ga-edubali gị na nnukwu nsogbu.

translation.en: This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice.
translation.ig: Nke a gụnyere iche n’ahịrị, dị ka enwere ike iji nkịta ndị na-esipụta ọgwụ n’oge ọ bụla na-amaghị ọkwa.

translation.en: Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death.
translation.ig: Ụfọdụ obodo nwere ntaramahụhụ mmebi iwu siri oke ike ma nyekwa ndị ọbụ mbụ ha imebi iwu; ndị a nwere ike ịgụnye ịtụ nga karịa afọ iri maọbụ ọnwụ.

translation.en: Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.
translation.ig: Akpa na-enweghị onye na-elekọta ha na-abụ ihe ebumnuche maka izu ohi ma na-adọtakwa uche ndị ọchịchị na-atụ egwu bọmbụ.

translation.en: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them.
translation.ig: N’ụlọ, n'ihi otu e si ebute nje keobodo mgbe niile, o were anya n'ebe ọ dị ukwuu na ị dịrịlarị nwee ahụ mgbochi maka ha.

translation.en: But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems.
translation.ig: Mana n'ebe ndị ọzọ n'ụwa, ebe ụdị nje bakteria bụ ihe ọhụrụ, ị kara nwee ike ịdaba na nsogbu.

translation.en: Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body.
translation.ig: Nakwa, n’ebe enwere okpomoku ihu igwe nje n’etoo osiso ma kwa n’ebite aka mgbe onoghi n’ahu mmadu.

translation.en: Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends.
translation.ig: Ya mere, ihe otiti nke Delhi Belly, Abụmọọnụ nke Fero, Mmegwara nke Montezuma, na ọtụtụ ndị enyi ha.

translation.en: As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.
translation.ig: Ka esi enwe nsogbu iku ume na obodo oyi na-atu, nsogbu eriri afo hirine na obodo di oku ma otutu oge ha na akpasu iwe ma odicahghi ize ndu.

translation.en: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock.
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ na imewe njem izizi n'ime obodo na-emepe emepe - maọbụ na mpaghara ọhụụ e kepụtara n'ụwa - elelikwala ihe iju anya nke omenala i nwere ike ịhụta.

translation.en: Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly.
translation.ig: Ọtụtụ ndị njem rijuru afọ bụ ndị njem n'ụwa ka na emepe emepe juru anya, ebe ọtụtụ obere mgbanwe omenala nwereike ịghọ ihe ukwu n'obere oge.

translation.en: Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize.
translation.ig: Okacha na mbido, nwaa ibi ndu ka onye bekee, omaricha ulo ezumike, ezigbo nri na inweta ezigbo ndi nnedo anya n’enyere aka imeda obi.

translation.en: Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna.
translation.ig: Arahụla n’elu matraasi ma ọ bụ n'elu paadị mgbe ị nọ n'ebe ị na-amaghị ala.

translation.en: If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ na ị ga-ama ụlọikwuu n’ezi, weta ihe ndina mara ụlọikwuu ma ọ bụ hammock iji gbochiri gị agwọ, akpị na ndị dị otú ahụ.

translation.en: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night.
translation.ig: Were isi kofi mejuputa ulo gi n’ututu were kwazia chamomile n’akwado ezumike mejuo ya n’abali.

translation.en: When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special.
translation.ig: Mgbe ị nọ na ezumike ime ụlọ, i nwere ohere ịlezi onwe gị anya ma were elekere ole na ole isipụta otu ihe pụrụ iche.

translation.en: If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies:
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ na aka na-akọ gị ọkọ karịa, were otu aka ahụ pịchaa maọbụ kwọọ ụfọdụ mkpụrụ osisi:

translation.en: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine.
translation.ig: o nwere ike i ga-achọpụta ihe ọṅụṅụ i nwere ike iji mee nri ụtụtụ mgbe ị gachara ihe dịịrị gị kwa ụbọchị.

translation.en: If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ na i bi n’obodo nwere ọdịnala ịn̄ụ mmanya dị iche iche, gaa n'ụlọ mmanya ma ọ bụ ebe ịn̄ụ mmanya na mpaghara ị na-anaghị aga ọtụtụ oge.

translation.en: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings.
translation.ig: Maka ndị na-aghọtaghị ụdịrị mkparịta ụka nke ndị dibia bekee, ahịrịokwu okwu "infectious" na "contagious" nwere mpụta dị iche iche.

translation.en: An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites.
translation.ig: Ọrịa na-efe efe bụ otu nke patoginụ kpatara, dị ka nje, bakterium, nje ero ma ọ bụ parasaịtị ndị ọzọ.

translation.en: A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person.
translation.ig: Ọrịa na-efe efe bụ ọrịa mmadụ nwere ike ibute site n'ịnọ na gburugburu onye na-arịa oria ahụ.

translation.en: Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases.
translation.ig: Ọtụtụ gọọmenti na mba dị iche iche nwere iwu na onye ọbụla na-abata maọbụ na-apụ n'obodo ha ga-ebu ụzọ gbaa ọgwụ mgbochi megide ụfọdụ ọrịa dị iche iche.

translation.en: These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.
translation.ig: Ihe ndị a na-achọ nwere ike idabere na mba ndị onye njem gagoro maọbụ ndị ọ chọrọ ịga.

translation.en: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families.
translation.ig: Otu n'ime ihe mere Chalọt, Nọt Karolaina jiri kara ibe ya bụ na o nwere ọtụtụ nhọrọ dị́ mma ma dị elu dịịrị ezinụlọ.

translation.en: Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around.
translation.ig: Ndị bi n’obodo ndị ọzọ na-arụtụkarị aka na nnabata ndị ezinaụlọ dịka isi ihe na-akpata ịkwaga ebe ahụ, ndị ọbịa na-ahụkarị obodo ahụ dịka ebe di mfe inwe obi ụtọ ma gi na ụmụaka gi soro.

translation.en: In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially.
translation.ig: N'afọ iri abụọ gara aga, ọnụ ọgụgụ nhọrọ dịịrị ụmụaka mma na Ọptaụn Chalọt amụbaala nke ukwu.

translation.en: Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances.
translation.ig: Ezinụlọ ndị bi na Chalọt anaghị aba tagzi, kama n'ọnọdụ dị añaa ha nwere ike jiri ha mee ihe.

translation.en: There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.
translation.ig: Enwere ụgwọ mgbakwunye dịịrị ibukarị ndị nje abụọ, ya mere nhọrọ nke a nwere ike ịdị ọnụ karịa ka okwesiri.

translation.en: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole.
translation.ig: Antatika bụ ebe kacha atụ oyi n'ụwa, ọ gbakwara isi ụwa nke ndịda ogige.

translation.en: Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea.
translation.ig: Nleta nke ndị njem nleta dị oké ọnụ, chọrọ ahụike anụ ahụ, nwere ike ịme naanị n'oge ọkọchị Nov-Feb, ma ejedebere ha n'ụzọ dị ukwuu na Peninsula ahụ, Agwaetiti na Oke Osimiri Ross.

translation.en: A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter.
translation.ig: Ndị ọrụ puku ole na ole na-ebi ebe a n'oge sọma, n'ime ihe dị ka ụlọ iri anọ na asatọ nke ọtụtụ n'ime ha nọ n'akụkụ ndị ahụ; ndị ụfọdụ na-anọ n'oge oyi.

translation.en: Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice.
translation.ig: Ime Obodo Antarctica bụ elu ugwu larịị tọgbọrọ n'efu nke aịs ruru kilomita 2-3 kpuchiri.

translation.en: Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.
translation.ig: Ọkachamara mgbe ụfọdụ nke njegharị n'ikuku na-aga n'ime ime obodo, maka ihe omume iri elu ugwu ma ọ bụ ịgarute na Polu, nke nwere nnukwu ntọala.

translation.en: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole.
translation.ig: Njem ngafe (ma ọ bụ Okporo ụzọ awara awara) Okporo Osisi ala nke Ndịda bụ okporo ụzọ dị kilomita 1600 site na Ọdụ ụgbọ McMurdo nọ na Oké Osimiri Ross ruo Okporo Osisi ala.

translation.en: It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies.
translation.ig: Sno ya kpụkọtara ọnụ nwere ọtụtụ oghere nke e jiri ọtụtụ ọkọlọtọ sụjuo ma mee akara. Ọ bụ naanị ụgbọndọkpụ pụrụiche, sledị e ji ebu ihe nwere ike ịgafe na ya n’iji mmanụ ụgbọala na ngwaahịa.

translation.en: These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.
translation.ig: Ndị a anaghị agbasi ọsọ ike ya mere ụzọ ije ya ga agba gburugburu ugwu Transatik wee bịa na ala ugwu.

translation.en: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps.
translation.ig: Ihe na akpatakarị ihe mberede n'oge oyi bụ ụzọ n'achị achị.

translation.en: At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient.
translation.ig: Ma ọ pekarịa mpe, nwee akpụkpọ ụkwụ nwere okpuru kwesịrị ekwesị. Akpụkpọ ụkwụ sọma na-amịkarị amị nke ukwuu n'elu aịs na sno, ma ụfọdụ akpụkpọ ụkwụ wịnta agaghị adị mma.

translation.en: The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures.
translation.ig: Nhazi ya kwesịrị imi emi ọfụma, 5 mm (1/5 inchi) maọbụ karia, nakwa akwa ya aghaghị idi nro ọfụma n'oge oyi.

translation.en: Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole.
translation.ig: Ụfọdụ buutu nwere stọọdụ ma e nwere akụrụngwa mgbakwunye stọọdụ maka ọnọdụ na-amị amị, nke dabara adaba maka ọtụtụ n’ime akpụkpọ ụkwụ na buutu, maka ikiri ụkwụ ndị ahị ma ọ bụ ikiri ụkwụ na ọbọụkwụ.

translation.en: Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.
translation.ig: Ikiri akpụkpọ ụkwụ kwesịrị ịdị ala ma saa asaa. Aja, okwute maọbụ nnu (kalshium kloraịdị) bụ ihe a na awụsakarị n'elu ụzọ iwedata ọchịchị ha.

translation.en: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches.
translation.ig: Avalanche abụghị ihe egwu; mkpọda ugwu nwere ike ijide naanị oke sno ọ ga-ejideli, nke fọrọ afọ ga-agbadata dị ka avalanche.

translation.en: The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest.
translation.ig: Ihe bụ nsogbu bụ na sno na-amapawa amapawa, ya mere ọ na-achọtụ mkpachara tupu ọ gbadata, ma ụfọdụ sno ịgbadata nwere ike bụrụ ihe mkpachara ga-eme ka ndị nke fọrọ afọ soro.

translation.en: Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.
translation.ig: Mgbe ụfọdụ ihe omume mbido na-akpalite bụ anyanwụ na-ekpo sinoo ọkụ, mgbe ụfọdụ mmiri ozuzo sinoo na-ezokwu ọzọ, mgbe ụfọdụ ihe omume eke ndị ọzọ, na-abụkarị mmadụ.

translation.en: A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward.
translation.ig: Oke ifufe tonado bụ ikuku kwụ ọtọ ma na-atụgharị, nke nwere obere preshọ, ma na-amịkpu ikuku dị ya gburugburu baa n'ime na n'elu.

translation.en: They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves.
translation.ig: Ha na ebupute oke ikuku (ọtụtụ mgbe maịlụ 100-200 kwa awa) ma nwee ike ibuli ihe ndị dị arọ n'ikuku, na-eburu ha dịka oke ifufe tonado na-aga.

translation.en: They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become "tornadoes" when they touch the ground.
translation.ig: Ha na-amalite dị ka fọneelụ si n’igwe ojii oké mmiri ozuzo agbada, ma bụrụzie “ụmụ ajọọ oké ifufe” mgbe ha metụrụ n’ala.

translation.en: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering.
translation.ig: Ndị nnyem VPN (virtual private network) keonwe bụ ezigbo ụzọ ịgbanaha ma mgbochi ke ọchiọhcị na mgbochi IP ọha keala mba.

translation.en: They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http.
translation.ig: Enwere ọtụtụ ihe mere ha ji kara web prọgzi mma: ha na-agbanwe ụzọ trafik ịntanetị niile, ọ bụghị naanị http.

translation.en: They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.
translation.ig: Ha na-enyekarị bandwidth dị elu karịa na saviisi ka mma. Ekpuchiri ha ekpuchi ya mere o siri ike inyota ihe dị ha n'ime.

translation.en: The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to "prevent piracy".
translation.ig: Ụlọ ọrụ ngosi ihe na-atụ asị kwa mgbe gbasara ihe nke a na-arụ, na-asị na ọ bụ "igbochi mmegharị n'enweghi ikike mmegharị".

translation.en: In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will.
translation.ig: N’ezie, koodu mpaghara enweghị mmetụta na nkọpi iwu megidere; nkọpị diski ga-akpọ ọfụma n'igwe ọbụla ebe nke ezigbo ya ga-akpọ.

translation.en: The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning.
translation.ig: Uru ọ bara n'ezie bụ ịme ka ụlọ ọrụ gasị nwee ikikere ebe ahịa ha nọ; Ihe a na-ele anya bụ ị na-esere ego dịka mmiri.

translation.en: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel.
translation.ig: Maka a na-eduzi ọkpụkpọ n'ofe ịntanetị, ị kwesịghị iji ụlọ ọrụ ekwentị nọ n'ebe ị bi ma ọ bụ ebe ị na-aga njem.

translation.en: There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona.
translation.ig: Ọ bụghịkwa iwu na ị ga-anara nọmba ekwentị obodo ebe i bi; i nwere ike ịnweta njikọ ịntanetị satịlaịt n'ọzara Chikin n'Alaska ma họrọ nọmba ekwentị na-ekwu na ị nọ n'okpuru anwụ Arizona.

translation.en: Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.
translation.ig: Ọtụtụ mgbe, ị ga ekwesị igo akara ekwentị zuru oha iche ka ekwentị PSTN nwee ike ịkpọ gị. Ebe akara ekwentị sị na-eme ihe dị iche nue ndị na-akpọ gị.

translation.en: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another.
translation.ig: Ụmụ ngwa nsụgharị ngwe keezigbo-oge – ngwa ndị nwere ike ịsụgharị nkebi ngwe zuzu ezu n’ezigbo-oge site n’otu asụsụ banye n’ọzọ.

translation.en: Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects.
translation.ig: Ụfọdụ ngwa nọ n’òtù a nwere ike ịsụgharị ngwe ndị nọ n’asụsụ mba ofesi nọ n’ụmụ nrụaka ma ọ bụ ihe ndị ọzọ n’ime ụwa n’ezie mgbe òjìàrụ ahụ chewere ekwentị-maihe ihu gakwuru ihe ndị ahụ.

translation.en: The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong.
translation.ig: Njin nsụgharị asụsụ agbanweela nke ọma nke ukwu, ka ha na enyezi nsụgharị ziri ezi (makwa ndị bna enweghị isi ọtụtụ mgbe) mana okwesiri nleba anya, n'ihi na ha nwere ike ịda ya.

translation.en: One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.
translation.ig: Otu n'ime ihe eji eme nke a bụ Ntụgharị Kegugulụ, nke na-enye ohere ime ntụgharị na-anọghị n'ịntanetị ka e budatachara asụsụ a chọrọ.

translation.en: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country.
translation.ig: Iji ngwa GPS n'ekwentị gị nwere ike bụrụ ụzọ kachasị mfe iji gagharịa mgbe ị na-anọghị n'obodo gị.

translation.en: It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company.
translation.ig: O nwere ike ichekwa ego n’ofe ịzụ ụmụ maapụ ọhụrụ maka otu GPS, ma ọ bụ otu ngwaọrụ GPS nkwụnotu ma ọ bụ ịgbazinye otu site n’otu ụlọ ọrụ mgbazinye ụgbọala.

translation.en: If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ na ịnweghị njikọ data n'ekwentị gị, maọbụ mgbe ha nọ n'ọpụpụ ogbe njikọ ahụ, arụmọrụ ha nwere ike dị obere maọbụ ọgaghị adị chaa chaa.

translation.en: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones.
translation.ig: Ahịa nkuku juputara na kaadị mkpọtụ ekwentị akwụgo ụgwọ enwere ike iji site na payphone ma ọ bụ igwe nkịtị.

translation.en: While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries.
translation.ig: N'agbanyeghị na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akara njiarụ ekwentị dị mma ịkpọ oku ekwentị gaa ebe ọbụla, ọrụ pụrụ iche ụfọdụ n'ime ha na-arụ bụ ime ka ọnụ ọkpụkpọ oku gaa ụfọdụ obodo dị ala.

translation.en: Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.
translation.ig: Inweta òhèrè n'ọrụ ndị a bụ site n'akara ekwentị n'akpọ oku n'efu nke e nwere ike isi n'ọtụtụ n'ime ekwenti kpọọ ya na-akwụghị ụgwọ.

translation.en: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so.
translation.ig: Iwu na-achị esem foto na-achịkwa esem vidiyo, onwere ike karịchaa na ya.

translation.en: If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it.
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ na iwu megidere ise ihe foto, ikwesidighi ịnwa ime ya vidio.

translation.en: If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required.
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ na iji drone arụ ọrụ, tulee n’oge dịka ihe e nyere gị ikikere iseta maọbụ ikikere maọbụ ikikere ọzọ gasị achọrọ.

translation.en: Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.
translation.ig: Ife ngwa dron fefee ọdụ ụgbọelu maọbụ igwe mmadụ na-abụkarị ihe ọjọọ, ma ọ bụrụ rịị na o megideghi iwu n'ebe ịnọ.

translation.en: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices.
translation.ig: N'oge ugbu a njem ụgbọ elu bụ naanị na ọ na-ara ahụ tupu e tinye akwụkwọ ya ozugbo site na ndị ụgbọ elu na-ebughị ụzọ chọọ ma tụnyere ọnụ ahịa.

translation.en: Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.
translation.ig: Oge ụfọdụ otu njem ụgbọelu nwere ike inwe ọnụahịa dị iche iche site n'aka ọtụtụ ndị nchịkọ ma ọ ga-abara gị uru ma ọ bụrụ na itule ọnụahịa ndị a ma leekwa anya n'amasaịba ụgbọelu ahụ tupu ịgbara tiketi.

translation.en: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist.
translation.ig: Ọ bụ eziokwu na ọ bụghị iwu inwe visa tupu a gaa ụfọdụ mba maka ọnụnọ obere oge dịka njem nlereanya maọbụ azụmahịa, mana ịga gụọ akwụkwọ ebe ahụ pụtara na ọnụnọ gị ga-ete aka karịa nke onye njem nlereanya nkịtị.

translation.en: In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance.
translation.ig: N’izugbe, ịnọ na mba ofesi ọbụla ruo ogologo oge ga-achọ ka ị nweta visa n'ọdịnihu.

translation.en: Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas.
translation.ig: Visa ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere ihe ọchịchọ dị iche ma usoro ngwa dị iche na nke onye njem nkịtị maọbụ visa ọrụ.

translation.en: For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course.
translation.ig: Nye ututu obodo ka n’onu-ogugu, iga enwe mkpa inweta akwukwo-ozi nke onyinye sitere ulo-akwukwo ha choro iga, ya na ihe ngosi ego nkwado iji kwadoo onwe gi ihe dika opekata mpe otu afo aguma akwukwo gi.

translation.en: Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.
translation.ig: Jụọ ese maka ihe ndị ọzọ achọrọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ nakwa na ngalaba mbata na ọpụpụ nke mba ebe ị chọrọ ịgụ akwụkwọ.

translation.en: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in.
translation.ig: N'abụghị ma ị bụ onye nnọchiteanya mba, ịrụ ọrụ n'ofesị mmiri pụtara na ị ga-akwụ ụgwọ ụtụ isi n'obodo ibi.

translation.en: Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another.
translation.ig: Obodo di iche iche na-ahazi ụtụ isi ha n'ụzọ nke ha, nakwa ụgwọ ụtụ isi na etu e si ahazi otu ndị na-akwụ ya dị iche site n'otu mba ruo n'ọzọ.

translation.en: In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.
translation.ig: N'ufodu mba nwere goomenti etiti dika United States na Canada, ana anako utu isi ego ma na goomenti etiti na kwa na mpaghara ya kpatara na onuego n’aka mgbodo ya ji di iche iche na mpaghara obula.

translation.en: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle.
translation.ig: Dịka nnyocha mbata na ọpụpụ anaghị adịkarị ya maọbụ ọ dịrị n'ụdị a sịkwa ka emee mgbe ị batara n’ala nna gị, njikwa ndị kọstọm nwekwara ike inye nsogbu.

translation.en: Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.
translation.ig: Kpachara anya ịmara ihe a ga-ekwe gị webata na nke iwu megidere ịwebata ma gwa ha ma ị nwee ihe ọbụla iwu akwadoghi.

translation.en: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website.
translation.ig: Ụzọ kachasị mfe ibido ọrụ edemede gbasara njem bụ ịmụta na webụsaịtị na-ede gbasara njem.

translation.en: After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.
translation.ig: Mgbe o dochaa gị anya etu e si agbanwe ma na-ahazi ihe n'ịntanetị ka onye siri chọọ, i nweziri ike gaa n'ihu rụọ weebụsaịtị nke gị.

translation.en: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving.
translation.ig: Ọrụ afọ ofufo mgbe i na eme njem bu uzu di ukwu iji mee ihe di iche ma obughi so n’inye ihe.

translation.en: Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills.
translation.ig: Ibi na ịrụ ọrụ afọ ofufo na mba ofesi bụ ezigbo ụzọ a ga-esi mata omenala dị iche, zute ndị mmadụ ọhụrụ, mụọ maka gị, nweta mmetụta nke echiche ma nwetakwa ụmụ nka ọhụrụ.

translation.en: It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.
translation.ig: O nwekwara ike bụrụ ezigbo ụzọ iji gbatịa nhazi mmefu ego inye ohere ịnọtukwu ogologo oge n'otu ebe ebe ọ bụ na ọtụtuụ ọrụ akwụghị ụgwọ na-enye ọnụụlọ na ụgbọ ma ole na ole na-akwụ obere ụgwọ ọnwa.

translation.en: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get.
translation.ig: Ndị Vaịkịngị ji ụzọ mmiri ndị Rọshịa were ruo osmiri na Osimiri Ojii na Osimiri Kaspịanụ. A ka na-esi ụfọdụ ụzọ ndị a ruo taa. Jụọ ase maka inweta ikike pụrụ iche, nke nwere ike ịra ahụ inweta.

translation.en: The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes.
translation.ig: Ụzọ mmiri Waịt Sii-Baltik jikọrọ Oke osimiri Aktik na Oke osimiri Baltik, site n'Ọdọmmiri Onega, Ọdọmmiri Ladoga na Saint Petersbourg, site n'osimiri na ọdọmmiri ọtụtụ mgbe.

translation.en: Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.
translation.ig: Ejikọkwara Ọdọ mmiri Onega na Volga, ya mere ịbịa site na Oke osimiri gafee Rọshịa ka kwekwara omume.

translation.en: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you.
translation.ig: Mara amara n’ozugbo iruru n’isi mmiri ihe niile ga-edo gi anya. I ga ahu ndi ozo n’acho ugbo mmiri ha ga banye, ha ga-agwa gi ihe gbasara onwe ha.

translation.en: Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc.
translation.ig: N'ụzọ bụ isi, ị ga na-etinye ọkwa nke na-enye enyemaka gị, na-ejegharị ije na dọọkụ, na-agakwuru ndị mmadụ na-ehicha ụgbọ mmiri ha, na-anwa ịkpọtụrụ ndị ọkwọ ụgbọ mmiri nọ n'ụlọ nkwụ ha, wdg.

translation.en: Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.
translation.ig: Nwaa igwa ka ha ra bu madu ole inwere ike igwa okwu. Obere oge mmadu nile amata gi ma tupenyere gi azu banyere ugbo-mmiri nke n’acho mmadu.

translation.en: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully.
translation.ig: Ị kwesịrị ịkpachapụ anya ịhọrọ ndị ụgbọ elu ị Na-esonyekarị Efe Mgbe Niile n'otu njikọ aka.

translation.en: Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.
translation.ig: Agbanyeghị na inwere ike iche na o sinammụọ isonye ndị ụgbọ elu ahụ ị na-esokarị ọtụtụ mgbe. Ị kwesịrị ịmara na ikike a na-enye na-adịkarị iche ma ebe ndị a na-agakarị nwere ike imesapụkwụ aka n’okpuru ụgbọ elu n’otu nkwekọrịta ahụ.

translation.en: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines.
translation.ig: Ụlọ ọrụ njem ụgbọelu dịka Emirets, Etihad Eewez, Katar Eewez, Tọkish Eewez ebidola ịrụ ọrụ n'Afrịka karịa, na-eme ka ndị mmadụ si na nnukwu obodo Afrịka gaa n'ọzọ n'ọnụ ahịa ka nke ụlọ ọrụ njem ụgbọelu ndị ọzọ si Yurop mma.

translation.en: Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014.
translation.ig: Ụmụ Ụlọọrụ ụgbọelu ndị Tọọki na-efe gaa ebe ije iri atọ na itoolu n’ime mba Afrịka iri atọ dị ka na 2014.

translation.en: If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare.
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụ na ị ka nwere oge njem, lee anya ka ị mara otu ego niile ọ ga-eri gị ịga Afrịka sị dị ma a tulee ya na ego ọ ga-efu gị ịgagharị ụwa gburugburu.

translation.en: Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.
translation.ig: Echefula igbakwunye ego ole ọzọ ụmụ visa ọzọ, ụtụ isi ọpụpụ, njem ụgbọ ala, dgz. ga-efu maka ebe ndị ọzọ ahụ niile na mpụga Afrịka.

translation.en: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes.
translation.ig: O buru na ichoro ifegheghari na ndida emisfee, i gaghi enweta mmasi gi na ugbo elu ma o bu ebe ije maka na enwere uko uzo transocean.

translation.en: No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings).
translation.ig: Onweghi nkwekorita ụgbọ elu na-ekpuchi ngafe oke osimiri atọ niile na Mpaghara Okpu Ndịda (ma SkyTeam anaghịkwa ekpuchi ngafe ọ bụla ahụ).

translation.en: However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight.
translation.ig: Agbanyeghi, Sta Alayans na-ahụ maka ihe niile belụ sọọsọ akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ Pasifik Ndịda site na Santiago de Chile ruo Tahiti, nke bụ njem ụgbọelu LATAM Otuụwa.

translation.en: This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
translation.ig: Ọ bụghị naanị njem ụgbọelu a dị, ma ọ bụrụ na ị chọghị igafe Pasifik Ndịda na akụkụ mmiri ọdịda anyanwụ nke Amerịka Ndịda. (lee anya n'okpuru ebe a)

translation.en: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris.
translation.ig: N'afọ 1994, ndị Negorno-Karabakh, ndị agbụrụ ha si mba Amenịa, buru agha megide ndị Azebaịjan.

translation.en: With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it.
translation.ig: Site na nkwado mba Amerịka, ejere mba ọzọ. N'agbanyeghị nke a, onweghị mba guzobere onwe ya - ọbughị ma mba Amenia - nabatara ya.

translation.en: Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
translation.ig: Arụmụka ọchịchị obodo ka na emebi mmekọ Amenia na Azabaịjan.

translation.en: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam.
translation.ig: Mpaghara Kanal (Dọch: Grachtengordel) bụ mpaghara narị afọ 17 a maara aha ya, gbara Binenstad nọ n'Amstadam gburugburu.

translation.en: The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.
translation.ig: UNESCO edetuola aha mpaghara niile a dịka Ebe Nketa Ụwa maka uru ọ bara nye omenala na akụkọ ụwa, nakwa ụlọ kacha dị ọnụ ebe ahụ karịa ebe ndị ọzọ n'obodo.

translation.en: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria.
translation.ig: Obodo ndị nọ n'ụsọ oke osimiri bụ Riomaggiore, Manarola, Kọniglia, Venaza and Monteroso ka a na-akpọ Sinque Terre, nke pụtara Ala Ise, nke dị na mpaghara Itali nke Liguria.

translation.en: They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List.
translation.ig: E debara aha ha na ndekọ Wọld Heritej List nke UNESCO.

translation.en: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
translation.ig: Ka afọ na-aga, ndị mmadụ arụọla ụzọ ngafe n'ala mkpọda nke juputara na nkume ruo n'ọnụ ugwu nke lepụgara anya n'oke osimiri.

translation.en: Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.
translation.ig: Otu n'ime ihe mere ndị mmadụ ji nwee mmasi na ya bu na o mepebeghi emepe. Okporo ụzọ, ụgbọ oloko na ụgbọ mmiri jikọrọ obodo ndị dị na ya. Ọzọ, ụgbọala enweghị ike isi n'ezi bata ya n'ime.

translation.en: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible.
translation.ig: Ụdị asụsụ French dị iche iche nke a na-asụ na Belgium ma na Switzerland dị iche na nke a na-asụ na France, mana ha yiri onwe ha ruo oke na onye ghọtara otu ga-aghọta ndị ọzọ.

translation.en: In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different.
translation.ig: Kpọmkwem, sistemụ ọnụ ọgụgụ n’ime ndị na-asụ Frenchị n’ime Belgịọm na Switzerlandị nwere ụfọdụ ndịiche ndị dị iche site na Frenchị a na -asụ n’ime Fransị, na mkpọpụta ụfọdụ mkpụrụ okwu dịtụ iche obere.

translation.en: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
translation.ig: N’agbanyeghị, Ndị Belgịọm na Swiiz niile na-asụ Frenchị agagọrọ ịmụ Frenchị izugbe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ, ha ga-enwe ike ịghọta ihe ị na-ekwu ma ọ bụrụgodu na ị jiri sistemụ ọnụọgụgụ Frenchị izugbe.

translation.en: In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating "hello."
translation.ig: N'ọtụtụ ebe n'ụwa, ife aka bụ emereme nnabata, nke na-egosipụta "ndeewo."

translation.en: However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means "come over," similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose.
translation.ig: Ma na, na mba Malesia, n'etiti ndị Males, ọ pụtara "bịa" dịka mgbe rọgharịrị mkpụrụ aka nke izi ịtụ onwe aka, akara e ji mere mkparịta ụka n'ọtụtụ obodo, ma bụrụ sọ ihe eji ya eme.

translation.en: Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back.
translation.ig: N'otu aka ahụ, onye ome njem Britenụ nọ na Spenụ nwere ike ịghọtaghie ofufe aka "ka ọdị" nke ihu aka chere onye na-efe ya ihu (kama onye a na-efere aka) ka ọ na-asị ya lọghachi.

translation.en: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating.
translation.ig: Ụmụ asụsụ inyeaka bụ asụsụ nke akamere ma ọ bụ asụsụ ndị ewuru ewu e kere n'ebumnuche nke ime ka mkparịta ụka dị n'etiti ndị gara-enwe nsogbu ikwurita okwu.

translation.en: They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.
translation.ig: Ha dị iche site na lingua franca, ndị nke bụ asụsụ ụwa ma ọ bụ nsinụwand ndị mechara wụọ nnọchike maka otu ihe mkpata ma ọ bụ nke ọzọ dị ka ụzọ nke nkwukọrịta n’etiti ndị na-asụ asụsụ ndị ọzọ.

translation.en: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things).
translation.ig: Na ughu ọkụ nke ụtụtụ, ndị njem nwere ike ịhụ mịraj nke na-eme ka ọdị ka mmiri (maọbụ ihe ọzọ) ọ dị n'ụzọ.

translation.en: These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water.
translation.ig: Ihe ndị a nwere ike ịgbawa obi ma onye njem gaa chụwa ihe efu a, na-emefusi ike a ga-eji eme ihe dị mkpa, ya na mmiri fọrọ afọ.

translation.en: Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.
translation.ig: Ọ bụrụgodina ọzara kacha ekpo ọkụ nwere ike ịjụ oke oyi n’abalị. Hypothermia bụ ihe ize ndụ dị ire ọ bụrụ na enweghị akwa na-ekpotụ ọkụ.

translation.en: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest.
translation.ig: Karịchaa n'oge ọkọchị, Ị kwesịrị ịnọ na nche maka anwụnta ma ọbụrụ na I kpebie ịga mkpagharị n'ọhịa udummiri.

translation.en: Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.
translation.ig: Ọbụrụgodi na iji ụgbọala agbafe ọhịa udummiri, nkeji ole m'ole ụzọ ghere oghe mgbe ị na-aba ụgbọala ezuola anwụnta iso gị bata.

translation.en: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals.
translation.ig: Bird flu, ma ọ bụ ezigbo aha ya avian influenza, nwere ike imetụta ma ụmụ nnụnụ ma ụmụ anụmanụ.

translation.en: Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal.
translation.ig: Akpabatabeghị ikpe okwu fọrọ obere ghara eru otu puku n’ụmụ mmadụ, mana ụfọdụ n’ime ha anwụọla.

translation.en: Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.
translation.ig: Ndị ka n'ọnụ ọgụgụ etinyela ndị ọrụ ọzụzụ ọkụkọ n'ọrụ, mana obere ihe ize ndụ dịịrị ndị na eledo nnụnụ anya.

translation.en: Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau.
translation.ig: Na mba Nọọwe, enwere mkpọda ugwu na ndịda ugwu na anọkata ghọrọ ala dị elu ma dị larịị.

translation.en: These plateaus are often referred to as "vidde" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse.
translation.ig: Ala ndị a dị larịị ka a na akpọ "vidde" nke pụtara ebe dị obosara, ghee oghe, dị mgbasa dị egwu ma ghara inwe osisi.

translation.en: In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called "hei" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather.
translation.ig: Na Rogaland na Agda a na akpọkarị ha "hei" nke pụtara ala dị larịị na enweghị osisi.

translation.en: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges.
translation.ig: Akpụrụ mmiri ebe ahụ anaghị anọ otu ebe, kama ọ na-eruda ugwu. Nke a na-ebute maka mgbaka na mpio nke akwa sno nwere ike ikpuchido.

translation.en: The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed.
translation.ig: Mgbidi na mkpuchi elu nke ọgba akpụrụ mmiri nwere ike ịda ma mechie mgbawa.

translation.en: At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.
translation.ig: N'ọnụnụ akpụrụ mmiri, akpụrụ buru ibu na-agbakapụ, daa nwekwaa ike tụgharịa daje oteaka ọnụnụ ya.

translation.en: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer.
translation.ig: Oge nlere anya ugwu na abụkarị n'oge ọkọchị India.

translation.en: However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
translation.ig: Mana, ha nwere mma dị iche n'oge oyi, mgbe sno na-ada n'ọtụtụ ugwu were nyefe efe msks ihe omume dịka skiyin na snobọdịn.

translation.en: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel.
translation.ig: Naanị ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ njem ụgbọelu ka na-enye ụgwọ nnwụnahụ, nke na-ewepụtụ ego n'ụgwọ njem akwamozu a na-eme na ngwụcha oge.

translation.en: Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet.
translation.ig: Ụgbọelu ndị na enye ihe ndị a bụ Air Kanada, Delta Air Laịns, Luftansa maka nfegharị bidoro na U.S. maọbụ Kanada, na WestJet.

translation.en: In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.
translation.ig: N'ọnọdụ niile, i ga-ejiriri ekwentị gị akwụ ụgwọ ọnọdụ gị n'ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu a.
